   16: -module(mam_SUITE).
   17: %% CT callbacks
   18: -export([all/0,
   19:          groups/0,
   20:          suite/0,
   21:          init_per_suite/1,
   22:          end_per_suite/1,
   23:          init_per_group/2,
   24:          end_per_group/2,
   25:          init_per_testcase/2,
   26:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   27: 
   28: %% Tests
   29: -export([mam_service_discovery/1,
   30:          muc_service_discovery/1,
   31:          simple_archive_request/1,
   32:          muc_archive_request/1,
   33:          muc_archive_purge/1,
   34:          muc_multiple_devices/1,
   35:          muc_private_message/1,
   36:          muc_deny_private_room_access/1,
   37:          muc_allow_access_to_owner/1,
   38:          range_archive_request/1,
   39:          range_archive_request_not_empty/1,
   40:          limit_archive_request/1,
   41:          prefs_set_request/1,
   42:          prefs_set_cdata_request/1,
   43:          pagination_first5/1,
   44:          pagination_last5/1,
   45:          pagination_before10/1,
   46:          pagination_after10/1,
   47:          pagination_simple_before10/1,
   48:          pagination_last_after_id5/1,
   49:          pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11/1,
   50:          pagination_empty_rset/1,
   51:          pagination_first5_opt_count/1,
   52:          pagination_first25_opt_count_all/1,
   53:          pagination_last5_opt_count/1,
   54:          pagination_last25_opt_count_all/1,
   55:          pagination_offset5_opt_count/1,
   56:          pagination_offset5_opt_count_all/1,
   57:          archived/1,
   58:          strip_archived/1,
   59:          filter_forwarded/1,
   60:          policy_violation/1,
   61:          offline_message/1,
   62:          nostore_hint/1,
   63:          purge_single_message/1,
   64:          purge_multiple_messages/1,
   65:          purge_old_single_message/1,
   66:          querying_for_all_messages_with_jid/1,
   67:          muc_querying_for_all_messages/1,
   68:          muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid/1,
   69:          run_prefs_cases/1,
   70:          run_set_and_get_prefs_cases/1]).
   71: 
   72: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   73: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   74: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   75: -include_lib("exml/include/exml_stream.hrl").
   76: 
   77: -define(assert_equal(E, V), (
   78:     [ct:fail("ASSERT EQUAL~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~n", [(E), (V)])
   79:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   80:     )).
   81: 
   82: -define(assert_equal_extra(E, V, Extra), (
   83:     [ct:fail("assert_equal_extra(~s, ~s)~n\tExpected ~p~n\tValue ~p~nExtra ~p~n",
   84:              [(??E), (??V), (E), (V), (Extra)])
   85:      || (E) =/= (V)]
   86:     )).
   87: 
   88: -record(rsm_in, {
   89:         max         :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
   90:         direction   :: before | 'after' | undefined,
   91:         id          :: binary() | undefined,
   92:         index       :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
   93:         after_id    :: binary() | undefined,
   94:         before_id   :: binary() | undefined,
   95:         from_id     :: binary() | undefined,
   96:         to_id       :: binary() | undefined,
   97:         simple = false :: boolean(),
   98:         opt_count = false :: boolean()
   99:         }).
  100: 
  101: -record(forwarded_message, {
  102:     from           :: binary() | undefined,
  103:     to             :: binary() | undefined,
  104:     result_queryid :: binary() | undefined,
  105:     result_id      :: binary() | undefined,
  106:     delay_from     :: binary() | undefined,
  107:     delay_stamp    :: binary() | undefined,
  108:     message_to     :: binary() | undefined,
  109:     message_type   :: binary() | undefined,
  110:     message_body   :: binary() | undefined
  111: }).
  112: 
  113: -record(result_iq, {
  114:     from            :: binary(),
  115:     to              :: binary(),
  116:     id              :: binary(),
  117:     first           :: binary() | undefined,
  118:     first_index     :: non_neg_integer() | undefined,
  119:     last            :: binary() | undefined,
  120:     count           :: non_neg_integer()
  121: }).
  122: 
  123: -record(error_iq, {
  124:     id              :: binary(),
  125:     type            :: binary(),
  126:     error_type      :: binary(),
  127:     condition       :: binary(),
  128:     text            :: binary()
  129: }).
  130: 
  131: -record(prefs_result_iq, {
  132:     default_mode    :: binary() | undefined,
  133:     always_jids = [] :: [binary()],
  134:     never_jids  = [] :: [binary()]
  135: }).
  136: 
  137: 
  138: -record(mam_archive_respond, {
  139:           respond_messages,
  140:           respond_iq,
  141:           respond_fin
  142:          }).
  143: 
  144: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  145: %% Suite configuration
  146: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  147: 
  148: muc_host() ->
  149:     <<"muc.localhost">>.
  150: 
  151: host() ->
  152:     <<"localhost">>.
  153: 
  154: configurations() ->
  155:     odbc_configs(is_odbc_enabled(host()))
  156:     ++ riak_configs(is_riak_enabled(host())).
  157: 
  158: odbc_configs(true) ->
  159:     [odbc,
  160:      odbc_simple,
  161:      odbc_async_pool,
  162:      odbc_mnesia,
  163:      odbc_async_cache,
  164:      odbc_cache,
  165:      odbc_mnesia_cache,
  166:      odbc_mnesia_muc_cache];
  167: odbc_configs(_) ->
  168:     [].
  169: 
  170: riak_configs(true) ->
  171:      [riak_timed_yz_buckets];
  172: riak_configs(_) ->
  173:      [].
  174: 
  175: basic_group_names() ->
  176:     [
  177:     mam,
  178:     mam03,
  179:     mam04,
  180:     mam_purge,
  181:     muc,
  182:     muc03,
  183:     muc04,
  184:     muc_with_pm,
  185:     rsm,
  186:     rsm03,
  187:     rsm04,
  188:     with_rsm,
  189:     with_rsm03,
  190:     with_rsm04,
  191:     muc_rsm,
  192:     muc_rsm03,
  193:     muc_rsm04,
  194:     bootstrapped,
  195:     archived,
  196:     policy_violation,
  197:     nostore,
  198:     prefs_cases
  199:     ].
  200: 
  201: all() ->
  202:     Reasons =
  203:     case is_mam_possible(host())  of
  204:         false -> [require_odbc];
  205:         true  -> []
  206:     end,
  207:     case Reasons of
  208:         [] ->
  209:             tests();
  210:         [_|_] ->
  211:             {skip, Reasons}
  212:     end.
  213: 
  214: tests() ->
  215:     [{group, full_group(C, G)}
  216:      || C <- configurations(), G <- basic_group_names(),
  217:         not is_skipped(C, G)].
  218: 
  219: groups() ->
  220:     [{full_group(C, G), Props, Tests}
  221:      || C <- configurations(), {G, Props, Tests} <- basic_groups(),
  222:         not is_skipped(C, G)].
  223: 
  224: is_skipped(_, _) ->
  225:     false.
  226: 
  227: 
  228: basic_groups() ->
  229:     [{bootstrapped,     [], bootstrapped_cases()},
  230:      {mam,              [], mam_cases()},
  231:      {mam03,            [], mam_cases()},
  232:      {mam04,            [], mam_cases()},
  233:      {mam_purge,        [], mam_purge_cases()},
  234:      {archived,         [], archived_cases()},
  235:      {policy_violation, [], policy_violation_cases()},
  236:      {nostore,          [], nostore_cases()},
  237:      {muc,              [], muc_cases()},
  238:      {muc03,            [], muc_cases()},
  239:      {muc04,            [], muc_cases()},
  240:      {muc_with_pm,      [], muc_cases()},
  241:      {rsm,              [], rsm_cases()},
  242:      {rsm03,            [], rsm_cases()},
  243:      {rsm04,            [], rsm_cases()},
  244:      {muc_rsm,          [], muc_rsm_cases()},
  245:      {muc_rsm03,        [], muc_rsm_cases()},
  246:      {muc_rsm04,        [], muc_rsm_cases()},
  247:      {with_rsm,         [], with_rsm_cases()},
  248:      {with_rsm03,       [], with_rsm_cases()},
  249:      {with_rsm04,       [], with_rsm_cases()},
  250:      {prefs_cases,      [], prefs_cases()}].
  251: 
  252: bootstrapped_cases() ->
  253:      [purge_old_single_message,
  254:       querying_for_all_messages_with_jid].
  255: 
  256: mam_cases() ->
  257:     [mam_service_discovery,
  258:      simple_archive_request,
  259:      range_archive_request,
  260:      range_archive_request_not_empty,
  261:      limit_archive_request].
  262: 
  263: mam_purge_cases() ->
  264:     [purge_single_message,
  265:      purge_multiple_messages].
  266: 
  267: archived_cases() ->
  268:     [archived,
  269:      strip_archived,
  270:      filter_forwarded].
  271: 
  272: policy_violation_cases() ->
  273:     [policy_violation].
  274: 
  275: nostore_cases() ->
  276:     [offline_message,
  277:      nostore_hint].
  278: 
  279: muc_cases() ->
  280:     [muc_service_discovery,
  281:      muc_archive_request,
  282:      muc_archive_purge,
  283:      muc_multiple_devices,
  284:      muc_private_message,
  285:      muc_deny_private_room_access,
  286:      muc_allow_access_to_owner,
  287:      muc_querying_for_all_messages,
  288:      muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid
  289:      ].
  290: 
  291: muc_rsm_cases() ->
  292:     rsm_cases().
  293: 
  294: with_rsm_cases() ->
  295:     rsm_cases().
  296: 
  297: rsm_cases() ->
  298:       [pagination_first5,
  299:        pagination_last5,
  300:        pagination_before10,
  301:        pagination_after10,
  302:        pagination_empty_rset,
  303:        %% Border cases
  304:        pagination_last_after_id5,
  305:        pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11,
  306:        %% Simple cases
  307:        pagination_simple_before10,
  308:        %% opt_count cases
  309:        pagination_first5_opt_count,
  310:        pagination_last5_opt_count,
  311:        pagination_offset5_opt_count,
  312:        %% opt_count cases with all messages on the page
  313:        pagination_first25_opt_count_all,
  314:        pagination_last25_opt_count_all,
  315:        pagination_offset5_opt_count_all].
  316: 
  317: prefs_cases() ->
  318:     [prefs_set_request,
  319:      prefs_set_cdata_request,
  320:      run_prefs_cases,
  321:      run_set_and_get_prefs_cases].
  322: 
  323: suite() ->
  324:     escalus:suite().
  325: 
  326: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  327:     disable_shaping(
  328:       delete_users([{escalus_user_db, {module, escalus_ejabberd}}
  329:                   | escalus:init_per_suite(Config)])).
  330: 
  331: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  332:     escalus:end_per_suite(restore_shaping(Config)).
  333: 
  334: user_names() ->
  335:     [alice, bob, kate].
  336: 
  337: create_users(Config) ->
  338:     escalus:create_users(Config, {by_name, user_names()}).
  339: 
  340: delete_users(Config) ->
  341:     escalus:delete_users(Config, {by_name, user_names()}),
  342:     Config.
  343: 
  344: disable_shaping(Config) ->
  345:     OldShaper = get_shaper(),
  346:     set_shaper({{maxrate, 100}, {maxrate, 10000000}, {maxrate, 10000000}}),
  347:     [{old_mam_shaper, OldShaper}|Config].
  348: 
  349: restore_shaping(Config) ->
  350:     OldShaper = proplists:get_value(old_mam_shaper, Config),
  351:     set_shaper(OldShaper),
  352:     Config.
  353: 
  354: get_shaper() ->
  355:     Mam = rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, get_global_option, [{shaper, mam_shaper, global}]),
  356:     Norm = rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, get_global_option, [{shaper, normal, global}]),
  357:     Fast = rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, get_global_option, [{shaper, fast, global}]),
  358:     {Mam, Norm, Fast}.
  359: 
  360: set_shaper({Mam, Norm, Fast}) ->
  361:     rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, add_global_option, [{shaper, mam_shaper, global}, Mam]),
  362:     rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, add_global_option, [{shaper, normal, global}, Norm]),
  363:     rpc_apply(ejabberd_config, add_global_option, [{shaper, fast, global}, Fast]),
  364:     rpc_apply(shaper_srv, reset_all_shapers, [host()]).
  365: 
  366: init_per_group(Group, ConfigIn) ->
  367:    C = configuration(Group),
  368:    B = basic_group(Group),
  369:    case init_modules(C, B, ConfigIn) of
  370:         skip ->
  371:             {skip, print_configuration_not_supported(C, B)};
  372:         Config0 ->
  373:             ct:pal("Init per group ~p; configuration ~p; basic group ~p",
  374:                    [Group, C, B]),
  375:             Config1 = do_init_per_group(C, Config0),
  376:             [{basic_group, B}, {configuration, C} | init_state(C, B, Config1)]
  377:     end.
  378: 
  379: do_init_per_group(C, ConfigIn) ->
  380:     Config0 = create_users(ConfigIn),
  381:     case C of
  382:         riak_timed_yz_buckets ->
  383:             [{yz_wait, 2500} | Config0];
  384:         _ ->
  385:             Config0
  386:     end.
  387: 
  388: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  389:     delete_users(Config),
  390:     C = configuration(Group),
  391:     B = basic_group(Group),
  392:     end_modules(C, B, Config).
  393: 
  394: init_modules(C, muc_rsm, Config) ->
  395:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  396: init_modules(C, muc_rsm03, Config) ->
  397:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  398: init_modules(C, muc_rsm04, Config) ->
  399:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  400: 
  401: init_modules(C, muc03, Config) ->
  402:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  403: init_modules(C, muc04, Config) ->
  404:     init_modules(C, muc, Config);
  405: 
  406: init_modules(ca, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  407:     %% TODO add mod_mam with Cassandra
  408:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_ca_arch, []),
  409:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  410:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  411:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  412:     Config;
  413: init_modules(odbc, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  414:     %% TODO test both mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch and mod_mam_odbc_arch
  415:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc, pm]),
  416:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  417:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  418:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  419:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  420:     Config;
  421: init_modules(odbc_simple, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  422:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc, pm, simple]),
  423:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  424:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  425:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  426:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  427:     Config;
  428: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  429:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  430:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  431:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [no_writer, pm]),
  432:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  433:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  434:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  435:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  436:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  437:     Config;
  438: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  439:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  440:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  441:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  442:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  443:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  444:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  445:     Config;
  446: init_modules(odbc_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  447:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  448:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  449:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  450:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  451:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  452:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  453:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  454:     Config;
  455: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  456:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  457:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  458:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [no_writer, pm]),
  459:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  460:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  461:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  462:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  463:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  464:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  465:     Config;
  466: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  467:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  468:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  469:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  470:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  471:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  472:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_cache_user, []),
  473:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  474:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  475:     Config;
  476: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  477:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  478:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  479:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc, pm]),
  480:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc, pm]),
  481:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc, pm]),
  482:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  483:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  484:     Config;
  485: 
  486: init_modules(ca, muc, Config) ->
  487:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_ca_arch, []),
  488:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  489:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  490:     Config;
  491: init_modules(odbc, muc, Config) ->
  492:     %% TODO test both mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch and mod_mam_odbc_arch
  493:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [muc]),
  494:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  495:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  496:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  497:     Config;
  498: init_modules(odbc_simple, muc, Config) ->
  499:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [muc, simple]),
  500:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  501:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  502:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  503:     Config;
  504: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, muc, Config) ->
  505:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  506:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  507:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  508:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  509:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  510:     Config;
  511: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, muc, Config) ->
  512:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  513:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  514:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  515:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  516:     Config;
  517: init_modules(odbc_cache, muc, Config) ->
  518:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  519:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  520:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  521:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  522:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  523:     Config;
  524: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, muc, Config) ->
  525:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, [no_writer]),
  526:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer, []),
  527:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [muc]),
  528:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  529:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  530:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  531:     Config;
  532: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, muc, Config) ->
  533:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  534:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  535:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  536:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_cache_user, [muc]),
  537:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  538:     Config;
  539: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, muc, Config) ->
  540:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch, []),
  541:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [muc]),
  542:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [muc]),
  543:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [muc]),
  544:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  545:     Config;
  546: init_modules(odbc, _, Config) ->
  547:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  548:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  549:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  550:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  551:     Config;
  552: init_modules(odbc_simple, _, Config) ->
  553:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  554:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, simple]),
  555:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  556:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  557:     Config;
  558: init_modules(ca, _, Config) ->
  559:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_con_ca_arch, [pm]),
  560:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  561:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  562:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  563:     Config;
  564: init_modules(odbc_async, _, Config) ->
  565:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  566:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  567:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_writer, [pm]),
  568:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  569:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  570:     Config;
  571: init_modules(riak_timed_yz_buckets, _, Config) ->
  572:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_riak_timed_arch_yz, [pm, muc]),
  573:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm, muc]),
  574:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  575:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_muc, [{host, "muc.@HOST@"}]),
  576:     Config;
  577: init_modules(odbc_async_pool, _, Config) ->
  578:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  579:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  580:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  581:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  582:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  583:     Config;
  584: init_modules(odbc_mnesia, _, Config) ->
  585:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  586:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  587:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm]),
  588:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  589:     Config;
  590: init_modules(odbc_cache, _, Config) ->
  591:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  592:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  593:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  594:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  595:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  596:     Config;
  597: init_modules(odbc_async_cache, _, Config) ->
  598:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  599:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm, no_writer]),
  600:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer, [pm]),
  601:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_prefs, [pm]),
  602:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  603:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  604:     Config;
  605: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_muc_cache, _, _Config) ->
  606:     skip;
  607: init_modules(odbc_mnesia_cache, _, Config) ->
  608:     init_module(host(), mod_mam, []),
  609:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_arch, [pm]),
  610:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_mnesia_prefs, [pm]),
  611:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_odbc_user, [pm]),
  612:     init_module(host(), mod_mam_cache_user, [pm]),
  613:     Config.
  614: 
  615: end_modules(_, _, Config) ->
  616:     [stop_module(host(), M) || M <- mam_modules()],
  617:     Config.
  618: 
  619: mam_modules() ->
  620:     [mod_mam,
  621:      mod_mam_muc,
  622:      mod_mam_con_ca_arch,
  623:      mod_mam_ca_arch,
  624:      mod_mam_muc_ca_arch,
  625:      mod_mam_odbc_arch,
  626:      mod_mam_muc_odbc_arch,
  627:      mod_mam_con_ca,
  628:      mod_mam_odbc_async_pool_writer,
  629:      mod_mam_muc_odbc_async_pool_writer,
  630:      mod_mam_odbc_prefs,
  631:      mod_mam_mnesia_prefs,
  632:      mod_mam_odbc_user,
  633:      mod_mam_cache_user,
  634:      mod_mam_muc_cache_user,
  635:      mod_mam_riak_timed_arch_yz].
  636: 
  637: init_state(C, muc_rsm03, Config) ->
  638:     Config1 = init_state(C, muc_rsm, Config),
  639:     [{props, mam03_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config1];
  640: init_state(C, muc_rsm04, Config) ->
  641:     Config1 = init_state(C, muc_rsm, Config),
  642:     [{props, mam04_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config1];
  643: init_state(_, muc_rsm, Config) ->
  644:     Config1 = start_alice_room(Config),
  645:     Config2 = clean_room_archive(Config1),
  646:     Config3 = send_muc_rsm_messages(Config2),
  647:     [{muc_rsm, true} | Config3];
  648: init_state(_, muc, Config) ->
  649:     Config;
  650: init_state(_, muc03, Config) ->
  651:     [{props, mam03_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config];
  652: init_state(_, muc04, Config) ->
  653:     [{props, mam04_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config];
  654: init_state(_, muc_with_pm, Config) ->
  655:     Config;
  656: init_state(_, rsm, Config) ->
  657:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config));
  658: init_state(_, rsm03, Config) ->
  659:     Config1 = [{props, mam03_props()}|Config],
  660:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  661: init_state(_, rsm04, Config) ->
  662:     Config1 = [{props, mam04_props()}|Config],
  663:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  664: init_state(_, with_rsm, Config) ->
  665:     Config1 = [{with_rsm, true}|Config],
  666:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  667: init_state(_, with_rsm03, Config) ->
  668:     Config1 = [{props, mam03_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config],
  669:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  670: init_state(_, with_rsm04, Config) ->
  671:     Config1 = [{props, mam04_props()}, {with_rsm, true}|Config],
  672:     send_rsm_messages(clean_archives(Config1));
  673: init_state(_, run_prefs_cases, Config) ->
  674:     clean_archives(Config);
  675: init_state(_, mam03, Config) ->
  676:     Config1 = [{props, mam03_props()}|Config],
  677:     clean_archives(Config1);
  678: init_state(_, mam04, Config) ->
  679:     Config1 = [{props, mam04_props()}|Config],
  680:     clean_archives(Config1);
  681: init_state(_, _, Config) ->
  682:     clean_archives(Config).
  683: 
  684: mam03_props() ->
  685:     [{data_form, true},                 %% send data forms
  686:      {final_message, true},             %% expect final message with <fin/> inside
  687:      {result_format, mess_fin},         %% RSM is inside final message
  688:      {mam_ns, mam_ns_binary_v03()}].    %% v0.3 namespace
  689: 
  690: mam04_props() ->
  691:     [{data_form, true},                 %% send data forms
  692:      {result_format, iq_fin},           %% RSM is inside iq with <fin/> inside
  693:      {mam_ns, mam_ns_binary_v04()}].
  694: 
  695: init_per_testcase(C=archived, ConfigIn) ->
  696:     Config = case ?config(configuration, ConfigIn) of
  697:                  odbc_async_pool ->
  698:                      MongooseMetrics = [
  699:                                         {[data, odbc, mam_async],
  700:                                          [{recv_oct, '>'}, {send_oct, '>'}]}
  701:                                        ],
  702:                      [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn];
  703:                  _ ->
  704:                      ConfigIn
  705:              end,
  706:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  707: init_per_testcase(C=strip_archived, Config) ->
  708:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  709: init_per_testcase(C=filter_forwarded, Config) ->
  710:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  711: init_per_testcase(C=purge_single_message, Config) ->
  712:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  713: init_per_testcase(C=purge_multiple_messages, Config) ->
  714:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_archives(Config));
  715: init_per_testcase(C=purge_old_single_message, Config) ->
  716:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  717:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  718: init_per_testcase(C=querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  719:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  720:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  721: init_per_testcase(C=offline_message, Config) ->
  722:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  723:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  724: init_per_testcase(C=nostore_hint, Config) ->
  725:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, Config); %% skip bootstrap & clean to safe time
  726: init_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages, Config) ->
  727:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  728:         muc_bootstrap_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  729: init_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  730:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  731:         muc_bootstrap_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  732: init_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_request, Config) ->
  733:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  734: init_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_purge, Config) ->
  735:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  736: init_per_testcase(C=muc_multiple_devices, Config) ->
  737:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, clean_room_archive(start_alice_room(Config)));
  738: init_per_testcase(C=muc_private_message, Config) ->
  739:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_room(Config));
  740: init_per_testcase(C=muc_deny_private_room_access, Config) ->
  741:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_private_room(Config));
  742: init_per_testcase(C=muc_allow_access_to_owner, Config) ->
  743:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C, start_alice_private_room(Config));
  744: init_per_testcase(C=range_archive_request_not_empty, Config) ->
  745:     escalus:init_per_testcase(C,
  746:         bootstrap_archive(clean_archives(Config)));
  747: init_per_testcase(C=prefs_set_request, Config) ->
  748:     skip_if_riak(C, Config);
  749: init_per_testcase(C=prefs_set_cdata_request, Config) ->
  750:     skip_if_riak(C, Config);
  751: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  752:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  753: 
  754: skip_if_riak(C, Config) ->
  755:     case ?config(configuration, Config) of
  756:         riak_timed_yz_buckets ->
  757:             {skip, "prefs not implemented for riak"};
  758:         _ ->
  759:             escalus:init_per_testcase(C, Config)
  760:     end.
  761: 
  762: end_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_request, Config) ->
  763:     destroy_room(Config),
  764:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  765: end_per_testcase(C=muc_archive_purge, Config) ->
  766:     destroy_room(Config),
  767:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  768: end_per_testcase(C=muc_multiple_devices, Config) ->
  769:     destroy_room(Config),
  770:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  771: end_per_testcase(C=muc_private_message, Config) ->
  772:     destroy_room(Config),
  773:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  774: end_per_testcase(C=muc_deny_private_room_access, Config) ->
  775:     destroy_room(Config),
  776:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  777: end_per_testcase(C=muc_allow_access_to_owner, Config) ->
  778:     destroy_room(Config),
  779:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  780: end_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages, Config) ->
  781:     destroy_room(Config),
  782:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  783: end_per_testcase(C=muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid, Config) ->
  784:     destroy_room(Config),
  785:     escalus:end_per_testcase(C, Config);
  786: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  787:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  788: 
  789: init_module(Host, Mod, Args) ->
  790:     lists:member(Mod, mam_modules())
  791:     orelse
  792:     ct:fail("Unknown module ~p", [Mod]),
  793:     stop_module(Host, Mod),
  794:     ok = start_module(Host, Mod, Args).
  795: 
  796: is_loaded_module(Host, Mod) ->
  797:     rpc_apply(gen_mod, is_loaded, [Host, Mod]).
  798: 
  799: start_module(Host, Mod, Args) ->
  800:     rpc_apply(gen_mod, start_module, [Host, Mod, Args]).
  801: 
  802: stop_module(Host, Mod) ->
  803:     case is_loaded_module(Host, Mod) of
  804:         non_existing -> ok;
  805:         false        -> ok;
  806:         true         -> just_stop_module(Host, Mod)
  807:     end.
  808: 
  809: just_stop_module(Host, Mod) ->
  810:     {atomic, ok} = rpc_apply(gen_mod, stop_module, [Host, Mod]),
  811:     ok.
  812: 
  813: rpc_apply(M, F, Args) ->
  814:     case rpc_call(M, F, Args) of
  815:     {badrpc, Reason} ->
  816:         ct:fail("~p:~p/~p with arguments ~w fails with reason ~p.",
  817:                 [M, F, length(Args), Args, Reason]);
  818:     Result ->
  819:         Result
  820:     end.
  821: 
  822: rpc_call(M, F, A) ->
  823:     Node = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_node),
  824:     Cookie = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_cookie),
  825:     escalus_ct:rpc_call(Node, M, F, A, 10000, Cookie).
  826: 
  827: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  828: %% Group name helpers
  829: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  830: 
  831: full_group(Conf, Group) ->
  832:     list_to_atom(atom_to_list(Conf) ++ "_" ++ atom_to_list(Group)).
  833: 
  834: %% @doc Delete suffix.
  835: configuration(Group) ->
  836:     match_atom_prefix(Group, make_greedy(configurations())).
  837: 
  838: %% @doc Rearrange a list of strings (or atoms), that all prefixes
  839: %% will be tested.
  840: %%
  841: %% Example:
  842: %% `make_greedy(odbc_mnesia_muc, [odbc, odbc_mnesia]) -> odbc'
  843: %% `make_greedy(odbc_mnesia_muc, match_longer_first([odbc, odbc_mnesia])) -> odbc_mnesia'
  844: %% @end
  845: make_greedy(List) ->
  846:     lists:reverse(lists:usort(List)).
  847: 
  848: %% @doc Delete prefix.
  849: basic_group(Group) ->
  850:     basic_group(Group, configuration(Group)).
  851: 
  852: basic_group(Group, Conf) ->
  853:     ConfS = atom_to_list(Conf),
  854:     GroupS = atom_to_list(Group),
  855:     list_to_atom(delete_delimiter(delete_prefix(ConfS, GroupS))).
  856: 
  857: match_atom_prefix(Target, Prefixes) ->
  858:     match_atom_prefix_1(atom_to_list(Target), Prefixes).
  859: 
  860: match_atom_prefix_1(TargetS, [PrefixA|Prefixes]) ->
  861:     PrefixS = atom_to_list(PrefixA),
  862:     case lists:prefix(PrefixS, TargetS) of
  863:         true -> PrefixA;
  864:         false -> match_atom_prefix_1(TargetS, Prefixes)
  865:     end.
  866: 
  867: delete_prefix([H|Prefix], [H|Target]) ->
  868:     delete_prefix(Prefix, Target);
  869: delete_prefix([], Target) ->
  870:     Target.
  871: 
  872: delete_delimiter("_" ++ Tail) ->
  873:     Tail.
  874: 
  875: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  876: %% Adhoc tests
  877: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  878: 
  879: %% Querying the archive for messages
  880: simple_archive_request(ConfigIn) ->
  881:     P = ?config(props, ConfigIn),
  882:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  883:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob
  884:         %% {xmlel,<<"message">>,
  885:         %%  [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
  886:         %%   {<<"to">>,<<"bob@localhost/res1">>},
  887:         %%   {<<"xml:lang">>,<<"en">>},
  888:         %%   {<<"type">>,<<"chat">>}],
  889:         %%   [{xmlel,<<"body">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"OH, HAI!">>}]}]}
  890:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  891:         maybe_wait_for_yz(ConfigIn),
  892:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
  893:         assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
  894:         ok
  895:         end,
  896:     MongooseMetrics = [{[backends, mod_mam, archive], changed},
  897:                        {[backends, mod_mam, lookup], changed}
  898:                       ],
  899:     Config = [{mongoose_metrics, MongooseMetrics} | ConfigIn],
  900:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  901: 
  902: querying_for_all_messages_with_jid(Config) ->
  903:     P = ?config(props, Config),
  904:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  905:         Pregenerated = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
  906:         BWithJID = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
  907: 
  908:         WithBob = [1 || {_, _, {JID, _, _}, _, _} <- Pregenerated, JID == BWithJID],
  909: 
  910:         CountWithBob = lists:sum(WithBob),
  911:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(P, BWithJID)),
  912:         assert_respond_size(P, CountWithBob, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
  913:         ok
  914:         end,
  915:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
  916: 
  917: muc_querying_for_all_messages(Config) ->
  918:     P = ?config(props, Config),
  919:     F = fun(Alice) ->
  920:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
  921:         MucMsgs = ?config(pre_generated_muc_msgs, Config),
  922: 
  923:         MucArchiveLen = length(MucMsgs),
  924: 
  925:         IQ = stanza_archive_request(P, <<>>),
  926:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(IQ, Room)),
  927:         assert_respond_size(P, MucArchiveLen, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
  928: 
  929:         ok
  930:         end,
  931:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
  932: 
  933: muc_querying_for_all_messages_with_jid(Config) ->
  934:     P = ?config(props, Config),
  935:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  936:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
  937:         BWithJID = room_address(Room, nick(Bob)),
  938: 
  939:         MucMsgs = ?config(pre_generated_muc_msgs, Config),
  940:         WithJID = [1 || {_, _, {JID, _, _}, _, _} <- MucMsgs, JID == BWithJID],
  941:         Len = lists:sum(WithJID),
  942: 
  943:         IQ = stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(P, BWithJID),
  944:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(IQ, Room)),
  945:         Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
  946: 
  947:         assert_respond_size(P, Len, Result),
  948:         ok
  949:         end,
  950:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  951: 
  952: archived(Config) ->
  953:     P = ?config(props, Config),
  954:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  955:         %% Archive must be empty.
  956:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  957:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  958: 
  959:         %% Bob receives a message.
  960:         Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  961:         try
  962:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(Msg, <<"archived">>),
  963:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
  964:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
  965:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
  966:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
  967: 
  968:         ?assert_equal(By, escalus_client:short_jid(Bob)),
  969: 
  970:         %% Bob calls archive.
  971:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  972:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
  973:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
  974:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId} = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
  975:         ?assert_equal(Id, ArcId),
  976:         ok
  977:         catch Class:Reason ->
  978:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
  979:             ct:pal("Msg ~p", [Msg]),
  980:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
  981:         end
  982:         end,
  983:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
  984: 
  985: filter_forwarded(Config) ->
  986:     P = ?config(props, Config),
  987:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  988:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
  989:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
  990: 
  991:         %% Bob receives a message.
  992:         escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
  993:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
  994:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
  995:         assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
  996: 
  997:         %% Check, that previous forwarded message was not archived.
  998:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q2">>)),
  999:         assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1000:         ok
 1001:         end,
 1002:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1003: 
 1004: strip_archived(Config) ->
 1005:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1006:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1007:         %% Archive must be empty.
 1008:         %% Alice sends "OH, HAI!" to Bob.
 1009:         escalus:send(Alice,
 1010:                      append_subelem(escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>),
 1011:                                     archived_elem(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
 1012:                                                   <<"fake-id">>))),
 1013: 
 1014:         %% Bob receives a message.
 1015:         Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1016:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1017:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1018:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1019:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1020:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1021: 
 1022:         ?assert_equal(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), By),
 1023: 
 1024:         try
 1025:         %% Bob calls archive.
 1026:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1027:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1028:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
 1029:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId} = parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1030:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1031:         ok
 1032:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1033:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1034:             ct:pal("Msg ~p", [Msg]),
 1035:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1036:         end
 1037:         end,
 1038:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1039: 
 1040: respond_messages(#mam_archive_respond{respond_messages=Messages}) ->
 1041:     Messages.
 1042: 
 1043: respond_iq(#mam_archive_respond{respond_iq=IQ}) ->
 1044:     IQ.
 1045: 
 1046: get_prop(Key, undefined) ->
 1047:     get_prop(Key, []);
 1048: get_prop(final_message, P) ->
 1049:     proplists:get_bool(final_message, P);
 1050: get_prop(result_format, P) ->
 1051:     proplists:get_value(result_format, P, iq_query);
 1052: get_prop(mam_ns, P) ->
 1053:     proplists:get_value(mam_ns, P, mam_ns_binary());
 1054: get_prop(data_form, P) ->
 1055:     proplists:get_bool(data_form, P).
 1056: 
 1057: wait_archive_respond(P, User) ->
 1058:     case get_prop(final_message, P) of
 1059:         true ->
 1060:             wait_archive_respond_fin(User);
 1061:         false ->
 1062:             wait_archive_respond_nofin(User)
 1063:     end.
 1064: 
 1065: wait_archive_respond_fin(User) ->
 1066:     %% rot1
 1067:     [IQ|MessagesAndFin] = wait_archive_respond_v03(User),
 1068:     [Fin|Messages] = lists:reverse(MessagesAndFin),
 1069:     #mam_archive_respond{
 1070:        respond_iq=IQ,
 1071:        respond_fin=Fin,
 1072:        respond_messages=lists:reverse(Messages)}.
 1073: 
 1074: wait_archive_respond_nofin(User) ->
 1075:     %% rot1
 1076:     [IQ|Messages] = lists:reverse(wait_archive_respond_v02(User)),
 1077:     #mam_archive_respond{
 1078:        respond_iq=IQ,
 1079:        respond_messages=lists:reverse(Messages)}.
 1080: 
 1081: %% MAM v0.2 respond
 1082: wait_archive_respond_v02(User) ->
 1083:     S = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User, 5000),
 1084:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_error(S) of
 1085:         true ->
 1086:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p", [S]),
 1087:             ct:fail("Unexpected error IQ.", []);
 1088:         false -> ok
 1089:     end,
 1090:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_result(S) of
 1091:         true  -> [S];
 1092:         false -> [S|wait_archive_respond_v02(User)]
 1093:     end.
 1094: 
 1095: %% MAM v0.3 respond
 1096: wait_archive_respond_v03(User) ->
 1097:     IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User, 5000),
 1098:     case escalus_pred:is_iq_error(IQ) of
 1099:         true ->
 1100:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p", [IQ]),
 1101:             ct:fail("Unexpected error IQ.", []);
 1102:         false -> ok
 1103:     end,
 1104:     escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1105:     [IQ|wait_archive_respond_v03_part2(User)].
 1106: 
 1107: wait_archive_respond_v03_part2(User) ->
 1108:     M = escalus:wait_for_stanza(User, 5000),
 1109:     escalus:assert(is_message, M),
 1110:     case is_final_message(M) of
 1111:         true ->
 1112:             [M];
 1113:         false ->
 1114:             [M|wait_archive_respond_v03_part2(User)]
 1115:     end.
 1116: 
 1117: is_final_message(M) ->
 1118:     undefined =/= exml_query:subelement(M, <<"fin">>).
 1119: 
 1120: assert_respond_size(P, Size, Respond=#mam_archive_respond{respond_messages=Messages})
 1121:       when length(Messages) =:= Size ->
 1122:     Respond;
 1123: assert_respond_size(P, ExpectedSize, #mam_archive_respond{respond_messages=Messages}) ->
 1124:     RespondSize = length(Messages) - 1,
 1125:     ct:fail("Respond size is ~p, ~p is expected.", [RespondSize, ExpectedSize]).
 1126:     %% void()
 1127: 
 1128: %% To conserve resources, a server MAY place a reasonable limit on how many
 1129: %% stanzas may be pushed to a client in one request.
 1130: %% If a query returns a number of stanzas greater than this limit and
 1131: %% the client did not specify a limit using RSM then the server should
 1132: %% return a policy-violation error to the client.
 1133: policy_violation(Config) ->
 1134:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1135:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1136:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 1137:         %% WARNING: are we sending too fast?
 1138:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 1139:                       escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
 1140:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 51)],
 1141:         %% Bob is waiting for 51 messages for 5 seconds.
 1142:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 51, 5000),
 1143:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1144:         %% Get whole history (queryid is "will_fail", id is random).
 1145:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"will_fail">>)),
 1146:         ErrorIQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1147:         try
 1148:             #error_iq{condition = Condition} = parse_error_iq(ErrorIQ),
 1149:             ?assert_equal(<<"policy-violation">>, Condition),
 1150:             ok
 1151:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1152:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1153:             ct:pal("ErrorIQ ~p", [ErrorIQ]),
 1154:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1155:         end
 1156:         end,
 1157:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1158: 
 1159: %% Ensure, that a offline message does not stored twice when delivered.
 1160: offline_message(Config) ->
 1161:     Msg = <<"Is there anybody here?">>,
 1162:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1163:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1164:         %% Alice sends a message to Bob while bob is offline.
 1165:         escalus:send(Alice,
 1166:                      escalus_stanza:chat_to(bob, Msg)),
 1167:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1168:         ok
 1169:         end,
 1170:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F),
 1171: 
 1172:     %% Bob logs in
 1173:     Bob = login_send_presence(Config, bob),
 1174: 
 1175:     %% If mod_offline is enabled, then an offline message
 1176:     %% will be delivered automatically.
 1177: 
 1178:     %% He receives his initial presence and the message.
 1179:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2, 1000),
 1180: 
 1181:     %% Bob checks his archive.
 1182:     escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1183:     ArcMsgs = R = respond_messages(wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1184:     assert_only_one_of_many_is_equal(ArcMsgs, Msg),
 1185: 
 1186:     escalus_cleaner:clean(Config).
 1187: 
 1188: nostore_hint(Config) ->
 1189:     Msg = <<"So secret">>,
 1190:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1191:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1192:         %% Alice sends a message to Bob with a hint.
 1193:         escalus:send(Alice,
 1194:                      add_nostore_hint(escalus_stanza:chat_to(bob, Msg))),
 1195:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1196:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 1000),
 1197: 
 1198:         %% Bob checks his archive.
 1199:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1200:         ArcMsgs = R = respond_messages(wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1201:         assert_not_stored(ArcMsgs, Msg),
 1202:         ok
 1203:         end,
 1204:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1205: 
 1206: purge_single_message(Config) ->
 1207:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1208:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1209:             escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"OH, HAI!">>)),
 1210:             maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1211:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1212:             [Mess] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice))),
 1213:             ParsedMess = parse_forwarded_message(Mess),
 1214:             #forwarded_message{result_id=MessId} = ParsedMess,
 1215:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_purge_single_message(MessId)),
 1216:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1217:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000)),
 1218:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q2">>)),
 1219:             assert_respond_size(P, 0, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
 1220:             ok
 1221:         end,
 1222:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1223: 
 1224: purge_old_single_message(Config) ->
 1225:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1226:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1227:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>)),
 1228:             Pregenderated = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
 1229:             AliceArchSize = length(Pregenderated),
 1230:             AllMessages = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, AliceArchSize,
 1231:                 wait_archive_respond(P, Alice))),
 1232:             ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 1233:             %% Delete fifth message.
 1234:             ParsedMess = lists:nth(5, ParsedMessages),
 1235:             #forwarded_message{result_id=MessId} = ParsedMess,
 1236:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_purge_single_message(MessId)),
 1237:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1238:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000)),
 1239:             %% Check, that it was deleted.
 1240:             escalus:send(Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q2">>)),
 1241:             assert_respond_size(P, AliceArchSize - 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
 1242:             ok
 1243:         end,
 1244:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1245: 
 1246: purge_multiple_messages(Config) ->
 1247:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1248:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1249:             %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 1250:             [begin
 1251:                 escalus:send(Alice,
 1252:                     escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
 1253:              end || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 1254:             maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1255:             %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 1256:             escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 1257:             %% Bob purges all messages from his archive.
 1258:             escalus:send(Bob, stanza_purge_multiple_messages(
 1259:                     undefined, undefined, undefined)),
 1260:             %% Waiting for ack.
 1261:             escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob, 15000)),
 1262:             escalus:send(Bob, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q2">>)),
 1263:             assert_respond_size(P, 0, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1264:             ok
 1265:         end,
 1266:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1267: 
 1268: muc_archive_request(Config) ->
 1269:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1270:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1271:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1272:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1273:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1274:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1275:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1276: 
 1277:         %% Bob received presences.
 1278:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1279: 
 1280:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1281:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1282: 
 1283:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1284: 		escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1285: 
 1286:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1287:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1288:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1289:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1290:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1291:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(BobMsg, <<"archived">>),
 1292:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1293:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1294:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1295:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1296: 
 1297:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1298: 
 1299:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1300:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1301:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
 1302:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId, message_body=ArcMsgBody} =
 1303:             parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1304:         ?assert_equal(Text, ArcMsgBody),
 1305:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1306:         ?assert_equal(RoomAddr, By),
 1307:         ok
 1308:         end,
 1309:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1310: %% Copied from 'muc_archive_reuest' test in case to show some bug in mod_mam_muc related to issue #512
 1311: muc_archive_purge(Config) ->
 1312:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1313:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1314:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1315:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1316:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1317:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1318:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1319: 
 1320:         %% Bob received presences.
 1321:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1322: 
 1323:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1324:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1325: 
 1326:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1327:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1328: 
 1329:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1330:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1331:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1332:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1333:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1334:         %% Flush all msgs to Alice
 1335:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 6),
 1336:         %% Alice purges the room's archive.
 1337:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(stanza_purge_multiple_messages(
 1338:            undefined, undefined, undefined), Room)),
 1339:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
 1340:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1341:         ok
 1342:     end,
 1343:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1344: 
 1345: muc_multiple_devices(Config) ->
 1346:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1347:     F = fun(Alice1, Alice2, Bob) ->
 1348:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1349:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1350:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1351:         %% You should use an unique nick for each device.
 1352:         escalus:send(Alice1, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice_1">>)),
 1353:         escalus:send(Alice2, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"alice_2">>)),
 1354:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, <<"bob">>)),
 1355: 
 1356:         %% Alice received presences.
 1357:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice1, 3),
 1358:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 3),
 1359: 
 1360:         %% Bob received presences.
 1361:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 1362: 
 1363:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1364:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1365: 
 1366:         %% Alice received the room's subject.
 1367:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice1, 1),
 1368:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice2, 1),
 1369: 
 1370:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1371: 		escalus:send(Alice1, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1372: 
 1373:         %% Alice receives her own message.
 1374:         Alice1Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice1),
 1375:         escalus:assert(is_message, Alice1Msg),
 1376: 
 1377:         Alice2Msg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice2),
 1378:         escalus:assert(is_message, Alice2Msg),
 1379: 
 1380:         Alice1Arc = exml_query:subelement(Alice1Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1381:         Alice2Arc = exml_query:subelement(Alice2Msg, <<"archived">>),
 1382:         ?assert_equal(Alice1Arc, Alice2Arc),
 1383: 
 1384:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1385:         %% This message will be archived (by alicesroom@localhost).
 1386:         %% User's archive is disabled (i.e. bob@localhost).
 1387:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1388:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1389:         Arc = exml_query:subelement(BobMsg, <<"archived">>),
 1390:         %% JID of the archive (i.e. where the client would send queries to)
 1391:         By  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>),
 1392:         %% Attribute giving the message's UID within the archive.
 1393:         Id  = exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"id">>),
 1394: 
 1395:         ?assert_equal(Alice1Arc, Arc),
 1396: 
 1397:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1398: 
 1399:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 1400: 
 1401:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1402:         [ArcMsg] = respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 1, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob))),
 1403:         #forwarded_message{result_id=ArcId, message_body=ArcMsgBody} =
 1404:             parse_forwarded_message(ArcMsg),
 1405:         ?assert_equal(Text, ArcMsgBody),
 1406:         ?assert_equal(ArcId, Id),
 1407:         ?assert_equal(RoomAddr, By),
 1408:         ok
 1409:         end,
 1410:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 2}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1411: 
 1412: muc_private_message(Config) ->
 1413:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1414:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1415:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1416:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1417:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1418:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1419: 
 1420:         %% Bob received presences.
 1421:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 2),
 1422: 
 1423:         %% Bob received the room's subject.
 1424:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1),
 1425: 
 1426:         %% Alice sends to Bob, using his occupant JID.
 1427:         %% This message will not be put into room's history.
 1428:         Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_to(room_address(Room, nick(Bob)), Text),
 1429:         escalus:send(Alice, Msg),
 1430: 
 1431:         %% Bob received the message "Hi, Bob!".
 1432:         BobMsg = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1433:         escalus:assert(is_message, BobMsg),
 1434: 
 1435:         BobArchiveAddr = escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
 1436:         ArchivedBy = [exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>)
 1437:                       || Arc <- BobMsg#xmlel.children,
 1438:                          Arc#xmlel.name =:= <<"archived">>,
 1439:                          BobArchiveAddr =/= exml_query:attr(Arc, <<"by">>)],
 1440:         ?assert_equal([], ArchivedBy),
 1441: 
 1442:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1443:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1444:         assert_respond_size(P, 0, wait_archive_respond(P, Bob)),
 1445:         ok
 1446:         end,
 1447:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1448: 
 1449: muc_deny_private_room_access(Config) ->
 1450:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1451:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1452:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1453:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1454:         Text = <<"Hi, Bob!">>,
 1455:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 1456:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 1457: 
 1458:         %% mod_muc returns error presence.
 1459:         Err1 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1460:         escalus_assert:is_error(Err1, <<"auth">>, <<"not-authorized">>),
 1461: 
 1462:         %% Alice sends to the chat room.
 1463: 		escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, Text)),
 1464: 
 1465:         %% Bob requests the room's archive.
 1466:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1467:         Err2 = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob),
 1468:         %% mod_mam_muc returns error iq.
 1469:         escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>, <<"not-allowed">>], Err2),
 1470:         ok
 1471:         end,
 1472:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1473: 
 1474: %% @doc Allow access to non-in-room users who able to connect
 1475: muc_allow_access_to_owner(Config) ->
 1476:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1477:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 1478:         Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1479:         RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 1480: 
 1481:         %% Alice (not in room) requests the room's archive.
 1482:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"q1">>), Room)),
 1483:         %% mod_mam_muc returns result.
 1484:         assert_respond_size(P, 0, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)),
 1485:         ok
 1486:         end,
 1487:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F).
 1488: 
 1489: %% @doc Querying the archive for all messages in a certain timespan.
 1490: range_archive_request(Config) ->
 1491:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1492:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1493:         %% Send
 1494:         %% <iq type='get'>
 1495:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1496:         %%     <start>2010-06-07T00:00:00Z</start>
 1497:         %%     <end>2010-07-07T13:23:54Z</end>
 1498:         %%   </query>
 1499:         %% </iq>
 1500:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_date_range_archive_request(P)),
 1501:         IQ = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 1502:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1503:         ok
 1504:         end,
 1505:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1506: 
 1507: range_archive_request_not_empty(Config) ->
 1508:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1509:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1510:         Msgs = ?config(pre_generated_msgs, Config),
 1511:         [_, _, StartMsg, StopMsg | _] = Msgs,
 1512:         {{StartMsgId, _}, _, _, _, _StartMsgPacket} = StartMsg,
 1513:         {{StopMsgId, _}, _, _, _, _StopMsgPacket} = StopMsg,
 1514:         {StartMicro, _} = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, decode_compact_uuid, [StartMsgId]),
 1515:         {StopMicro, _} = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, decode_compact_uuid, [StopMsgId]),
 1516:         StartTime = make_iso_time(StartMicro),
 1517:         StopTime = make_iso_time(StopMicro),
 1518:         %% Send
 1519:         %% <iq type='get'>
 1520:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1521:         %%     <start>StartTime</start>
 1522:         %%     <end>StopTime</end>
 1523:         %%   </query>
 1524:         %% </iq>
 1525:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_date_range_archive_request_not_empty(P, StartTime, StopTime)),
 1526:         %% Receive two messages and IQ
 1527:         Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
 1528:         IQ = respond_iq(Result),
 1529:         [M1,M2|_] = respond_messages(Result),
 1530:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1531:         #forwarded_message{delay_stamp=Stamp1} = parse_forwarded_message(M1),
 1532:         #forwarded_message{delay_stamp=Stamp2} = parse_forwarded_message(M2),
 1533:         ?assert_equal(list_to_binary(StartTime), Stamp1),
 1534:         ?assert_equal(list_to_binary(StopTime), Stamp2),
 1535:         ok
 1536:         end,
 1537:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1538: 
 1539: make_iso_time(Micro) ->
 1540:     Now = usec:to_now(Micro),
 1541:     DateTime = calendar:now_to_datetime(Now),
 1542:     {Time, TimeZone} = rpc_apply(jlib, timestamp_to_iso, [DateTime, utc]),
 1543:     Time ++ TimeZone.
 1544: 
 1545: %% @doc A query using Result Set Management.
 1546: %% See also `#rsm_in.max'.
 1547: limit_archive_request(Config) ->
 1548:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1549:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1550:         %% Send
 1551:         %% <iq type='get' id='q29302'>
 1552:         %%   <query xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp'>
 1553:         %%       <start>2010-08-07T00:00:00Z</start>
 1554:         %%       <set xmlns='http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm'>
 1555:         %%          <limit>10</limit>
 1556:         %%       </set>
 1557:         %%   </query>
 1558:         %% </iq>
 1559:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_limit_archive_request(P)),
 1560:         Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
 1561:         Msgs = respond_messages(Result),
 1562:         IQ = respond_iq(Result),
 1563:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, IQ),
 1564:         10 = length(Msgs),
 1565:         ok
 1566:         end,
 1567:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1568: 
 1569: pagination_empty_rset(Config) ->
 1570:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1571:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1572:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1573:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=0},
 1574: 
 1575:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1576:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"empty_rset">>, RSM)),
 1577:         wait_empty_rset(P, Alice, 15)
 1578:         end,
 1579:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1580: 
 1581: pagination_first5(Config) ->
 1582:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1583:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1584:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1585:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5},
 1586:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1587:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"first5">>, RSM)),
 1588:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 1, 5),
 1589:         ok
 1590:         end,
 1591:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1592: 
 1593: pagination_first5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1594:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1595:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1596:         %% Get the first page of size 5.
 1597:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5},
 1598:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1599:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"first5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1600:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 1, 5),
 1601:         ok
 1602:         end,
 1603:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1604: 
 1605: pagination_first25_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1606:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1607:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1608:         %% Get the first page of size 25.
 1609:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25},
 1610:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1611:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"first25_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1612:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 1, 15),
 1613:         ok
 1614:         end,
 1615:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1616: 
 1617: pagination_last5(Config) ->
 1618:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1619:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1620:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1621:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before},
 1622:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1623:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last5">>, RSM)),
 1624:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 11, 15),
 1625:         ok
 1626:         end,
 1627:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1628: 
 1629: pagination_last5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1630:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1631:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1632:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1633:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, opt_count=true},
 1634:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1635:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1636:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 11, 15),
 1637:         ok
 1638:         end,
 1639:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1640: 
 1641: pagination_last25_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1642:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1643:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1644:         %% Get the last page of size 25.
 1645:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25, direction=before, opt_count=true},
 1646:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1647:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last25_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1648:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 1, 15),
 1649:         ok
 1650:         end,
 1651:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1652: 
 1653: pagination_offset5_opt_count(Config) ->
 1654:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1655:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1656:         %% Skip 5 messages, get 5 messages.
 1657:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, index=5, opt_count=true},
 1658:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1659:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last5_opt">>, RSM)),
 1660:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 6, 10),
 1661:         ok
 1662:         end,
 1663:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1664: 
 1665: pagination_offset5_opt_count_all(Config) ->
 1666:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1667:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1668:         %% Skip 5 messages, get 25 messages (only 10 are available).
 1669:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=25, index=5, opt_count=true},
 1670:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1671:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last5_opt_all">>, RSM)),
 1672:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 6, 15),
 1673:         ok
 1674:         end,
 1675:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1676: 
 1677: 
 1678: pagination_before10(Config) ->
 1679:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1680:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1681:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1682:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, id=message_id(10, Config)},
 1683:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1684:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"before10">>, RSM)),
 1685:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 5, 9),
 1686:         ok
 1687:         end,
 1688:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1689: 
 1690: pagination_simple_before10(Config) ->
 1691:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1692:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1693:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1694:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction=before, id=message_id(10, Config), simple=true},
 1695:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1696:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"before10">>, RSM)),
 1697:      %% wait_message_range(P, Client, TotalCount,    Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1698:         wait_message_range(P, Alice,   undefined, undefined,     5,   9),
 1699:         ok
 1700:         end,
 1701:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1702: 
 1703: pagination_after10(Config) ->
 1704:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1705:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1706:         %% Get the last page of size 5.
 1707:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='after', id=message_id(10, Config)},
 1708:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1709:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"after10">>, RSM)),
 1710:         wait_message_range(P, Alice, 11, 15),
 1711:         ok
 1712:         end,
 1713:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1714: 
 1715: %% Select first page of recent messages after last known id.
 1716: %% Paginating from newest messages to oldest ones.
 1717: pagination_last_after_id5(Config) ->
 1718:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1719:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1720:         %% Get the last page of size 5 after 5-th message.
 1721:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='before',
 1722:                 after_id=message_id(5, Config)},
 1723:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1724:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last_after_id5">>, RSM)),
 1725:      %% wait_message_range(P, Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1726:         wait_message_range(P, Alice,          10,      5,    11,  15),
 1727:         ok
 1728:         end,
 1729:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1730: 
 1731: %% Select second page of recent messages after last known id.
 1732: pagination_last_after_id5_before_id11(Config) ->
 1733:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1734:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1735:         RSM = #rsm_in{max=5, direction='before',
 1736:                 after_id=message_id(5, Config),
 1737:                 before_id=message_id(11, Config)},
 1738:         rsm_send(Config, Alice,
 1739:             stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last_after_id5_before_id11">>, RSM)),
 1740:      %% wait_message_range(P, Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN),
 1741:         wait_message_range(P, Alice,           5,      0,     6,  10),
 1742:         ok
 1743:         end,
 1744:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1745: 
 1746: generate_message_text(N) when is_integer(N) ->
 1747:     <<"Message #", (list_to_binary(integer_to_list(N)))/binary>>.
 1748: 
 1749: rsm_send(Config, User, Packet) ->
 1750:     case ?config(with_rsm, Config) of
 1751:         true ->
 1752:             BWithJID = nick_to_jid(bob, Config),
 1753:             rsm_send_1(Config, User, add_with_jid(BWithJID, Packet));
 1754:         _ ->
 1755:             rsm_send_1(Config, User, Packet)
 1756:     end.
 1757: 
 1758: rsm_send_1(Config, User, Packet) ->
 1759:     case ?config(muc_rsm, Config) of
 1760:         true ->
 1761:             Room = ?config(room, Config),
 1762:             escalus:send(User, stanza_to_room(Packet, Room));
 1763:         _ ->
 1764:             escalus:send(User, Packet)
 1765:     end.
 1766: 
 1767: prefs_set_request(Config) ->
 1768:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1769:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1770:         %% Send
 1771:         %%
 1772:         %% <iq type='set' id='juliet2'>
 1773:         %%   <prefs xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp' default="roster">
 1774:         %%     <always>
 1775:         %%       <jid>romeo@montague.net</jid>
 1776:         %%     </always>
 1777:         %%     <never>
 1778:         %%       <jid>montague@montague.net</jid>
 1779:         %%     </never>
 1780:         %%   </prefs>
 1781:         %% </iq>
 1782:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_set_request(<<"roster">>,
 1783:                                                      [<<"romeo@montague.net">>],
 1784:                                                      [<<"montague@montague.net">>])),
 1785:         ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1786: 
 1787:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 1788:         ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1789: 
 1790:         ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 1791:         ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 1792:         ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 1793:         ok
 1794:         end,
 1795:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1796: 
 1797: %% Test reproducing https://github.com/esl/MongooseIM/issues/263
 1798: %% The idea is this: in a "perfect" world jid elements are put together
 1799: %% without whitespaces. In the real world it is not true.
 1800: %% Put "\n" between two jid elements.
 1801: prefs_set_cdata_request(Config) ->
 1802:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1803:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1804:         %% Send
 1805:         %%
 1806:         %% <iq type='set' id='juliet2'>
 1807:         %%   <prefs xmlns='urn:xmpp:mam:tmp' default="roster">
 1808:         %%     <always>
 1809:         %%       <jid>romeo@montague.net</jid>
 1810:         %%       <jid>montague@montague.net</jid>
 1811:         %%     </always>
 1812:         %%   </prefs>
 1813:         %% </iq>
 1814:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_set_request(<<"roster">>,
 1815:                                                      [<<"romeo@montague.net">>,
 1816:                                                       {xmlcdata, <<"\n">>}, %% Put as it is
 1817:                                                       <<"montague@montague.net">>], [])),
 1818:         ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1819: 
 1820:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 1821:         ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1822: 
 1823:         ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 1824:         ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 1825:         ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 1826:         ok
 1827:         end,
 1828:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1829: 
 1830: mam_service_discovery(Config) ->
 1831:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1832:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1833:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 1834:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:disco_info(Server)),
 1835:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 1836:         try
 1837:         escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Stanza),
 1838:         escalus:assert(has_feature, [mam_ns_binary()], Stanza),
 1839:         ok
 1840:         catch Class:Reason ->
 1841:             Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 1842:             ct:pal("Stanza ~p.", [Stanza]),
 1843:             erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 1844:         end
 1845:         end,
 1846:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1847: 
 1848: %% Check, that MUC is supported.
 1849: muc_service_discovery(Config) ->
 1850:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 1851:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 1852:         Domain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config),
 1853:         Server = escalus_client:server(Alice),
 1854:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:service_discovery(Server)),
 1855:         Stanza = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
