 1856:         escalus:assert(has_service, [muc_host()], Stanza),
 1857:         escalus:assert(is_stanza_from, [Domain], Stanza),
 1858:         ok
 1859:         end,
 1860:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 1861: 
 1862: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1863: %% Helpers
 1864: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1865: 
 1866: nick(User) -> escalus_utils:get_username(User).
 1867: 
 1868: mam_ns_binary() -> <<"urn:xmpp:mam:tmp">>.
 1869: mam_ns_binary_v03() -> <<"urn:xmpp:mam:0">>.
 1870: mam_ns_binary_v04() -> <<"urn:xmpp:mam:1">>.
 1871: muc_ns_binary() -> <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/muc">>.
 1872: 
 1873: stanza_purge_single_message(MessId) ->
 1874:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1875:        name = <<"purge">>,
 1876:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}, {<<"id">>, MessId}]
 1877:     }]).
 1878: 
 1879: stanza_purge_multiple_messages(BStart, BEnd, BWithJID) ->
 1880:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1881:        name = <<"purge">>,
 1882:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}],
 1883:        children = skip_undefined([
 1884:            maybe_start_elem(BStart),
 1885:            maybe_end_elem(BEnd),
 1886:            maybe_with_elem(BWithJID)])
 1887:     }]).
 1888: 
 1889: 
 1890: skip_undefined(Xs) ->
 1891:     [X || X <- Xs, X =/= undefined].
 1892: 
 1893: maybe_attr(_, undefined) ->
 1894:     [];
 1895: maybe_attr(K, V) ->
 1896:     [{K, V}].
 1897: 
 1898: mam_ns_attr(P) ->
 1899:     [{<<"xmlns">>,get_prop(mam_ns, P)}].
 1900: 
 1901: maybe_start_elem(undefined) ->
 1902:     undefined;
 1903: maybe_start_elem(BStart) ->
 1904:     #xmlel{
 1905:         name = <<"start">>,
 1906:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BStart}}.
 1907: 
 1908: maybe_end_elem(undefined) ->
 1909:     undefined;
 1910: maybe_end_elem(BEnd) ->
 1911:     #xmlel{
 1912:         name = <<"end">>,
 1913:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BEnd}}.
 1914: 
 1915: maybe_with_elem(undefined) ->
 1916:     undefined;
 1917: maybe_with_elem(BWithJID) ->
 1918:     #xmlel{
 1919:         name = <<"with">>,
 1920:         children = #xmlcdata{content = BWithJID}}.
 1921: 
 1922: %% An optional 'queryid' attribute allows the client to match results to
 1923: %% a certain query.
 1924: stanza_archive_request(P, QueryId) ->
 1925:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, QueryId,
 1926:                               undefined, undefined,
 1927:                               undefined, undefined).
 1928: 
 1929: stanza_date_range_archive_request(P) ->
 1930:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, undefined,
 1931:                               "2010-06-07T00:00:00Z", "2010-07-07T13:23:54Z",
 1932:                               undefined, undefined).
 1933: 
 1934: stanza_date_range_archive_request_not_empty(P, Start, Stop) ->
 1935:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, undefined,
 1936:                               Start, Stop,
 1937:                               undefined, undefined).
 1938: 
 1939: stanza_limit_archive_request(P) ->
 1940:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, undefined, "2010-08-07T00:00:00Z",
 1941:                               undefined, undefined, #rsm_in{max=10}).
 1942: 
 1943: stanza_page_archive_request(P, QueryId, RSM) ->
 1944:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, QueryId, undefined, undefined, undefined, RSM).
 1945: 
 1946: stanza_filtered_by_jid_request(P, BWithJID) ->
 1947:     stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, undefined, undefined,
 1948:                               undefined, BWithJID, undefined).
 1949: 
 1950: stanza_lookup_messages_iq(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 1951:     case get_prop(data_form, P) of
 1952:         false ->
 1953:             stanza_lookup_messages_iq_v02(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM);
 1954:         true ->
 1955:             stanza_lookup_messages_iq_v03(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM)
 1956:     end.
 1957: 
 1958: stanza_lookup_messages_iq_v03(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 1959:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 1960:        name = <<"query">>,
 1961:        attrs = mam_ns_attr(P)
 1962:             ++ maybe_attr(<<"queryid">>, QueryId),
 1963:        children = skip_undefined([
 1964:            form_x(BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM),
 1965:            maybe_rsm_elem(RSM)])
 1966:     }]).
 1967: 
 1968: 
 1969: form_x(BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 1970:     #xmlel{name = <<"x">>,
 1971:            attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"jabber:x:data">>}],
 1972:            children = skip_undefined([
 1973:                 form_field(<<"start">>, BStart),
 1974:                 form_field(<<"end">>, BEnd),
 1975:                 form_field(<<"with">>, BWithJID)]
 1976:                 ++ form_extra_fields(RSM)
 1977:                 ++ form_border_fields(RSM))}.
 1978: 
 1979: form_extra_fields(undefined) ->
 1980:     [];
 1981: form_extra_fields(#rsm_in{simple=Simple, opt_count=OptCount}) ->
 1982:     [form_bool_field(<<"simple">>, Simple),
 1983:      form_bool_field(<<"opt_count">>, OptCount)].
 1984: 
 1985: form_border_fields(undefined) ->
 1986:     [];
 1987: form_border_fields(#rsm_in{
 1988:         before_id=BeforeId, after_id=AfterId, from_id=FromId, to_id=ToId}) ->
 1989:     [form_field(<<"before_id">>, BeforeId),
 1990:      form_field(<<"after_id">>, AfterId),
 1991:      form_field(<<"from_id">>, FromId),
 1992:      form_field(<<"to_id">>, ToId)].
 1993: 
 1994: form_type_field(MamNs) ->
 1995:     form_field(<<"FORM_TYPE">>, MamNs).
 1996: 
 1997: form_field(VarName, undefined) ->
 1998:     undefined;
 1999: form_field(VarName, VarValue) ->
 2000:     #xmlel{name = <<"field">>, attrs = [{<<"var">>, VarName}],
 2001:            children = [#xmlel{name = <<"value">>,
 2002:                               children = [#xmlcdata{content = VarValue}]}]}.
 2003: 
 2004: form_bool_field(Name, true) ->
 2005:     form_field(Name, <<"true">>);
 2006: form_bool_field(Name, _) ->
 2007:     undefined.
 2008: 
 2009: 
 2010: stanza_lookup_messages_iq_v02(P, QueryId, BStart, BEnd, BWithJID, RSM) ->
 2011:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 2012:        name = <<"query">>,
 2013:        attrs = mam_ns_attr(P)
 2014:             ++ maybe_attr(<<"queryid">>, QueryId)
 2015:             ++ border_attributes(RSM),
 2016:        children = skip_undefined([
 2017:            maybe_simple_elem(RSM),
 2018:            maybe_opt_count_elem(RSM),
 2019:            maybe_start_elem(BStart),
 2020:            maybe_end_elem(BEnd),
 2021:            maybe_with_elem(BWithJID),
 2022:            maybe_rsm_elem(RSM)])
 2023:     }]).
 2024: 
 2025: maybe_simple_elem(#rsm_in{simple=true}) ->
 2026:     [#xmlel{name = <<"simple">>}];
 2027: maybe_simple_elem(_) ->
 2028:     [].
 2029: 
 2030: maybe_opt_count_elem(#rsm_in{opt_count=true}) ->
 2031:     [#xmlel{name = <<"opt_count">>}];
 2032: maybe_opt_count_elem(_) ->
 2033:     [].
 2034: 
 2035: border_attributes(undefined) ->
 2036:     [];
 2037: border_attributes(#rsm_in{
 2038:         before_id=BeforeId, after_id=AfterId, from_id=FromId, to_id=ToId}) ->
 2039:     maybe_attr(<<"before_id">>, BeforeId)
 2040:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"after_id">>, AfterId)
 2041:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"from_id">>, FromId)
 2042:     ++ maybe_attr(<<"to_id">>, ToId).
 2043: 
 2044: maybe_rsm_elem(undefined) ->
 2045:     undefined;
 2046: maybe_rsm_elem(#rsm_in{max=Max, direction=Direction, id=Id, index=Index}) ->
 2047:     #xmlel{name = <<"set">>,
 2048:            children = skip_undefined([
 2049:                 maybe_rsm_max(Max),
 2050:                 maybe_rsm_index(Index),
 2051:                 maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id)])}.
 2052: 
 2053: maybe_rsm_id(undefined) -> [];
 2054: maybe_rsm_id(Id) -> #xmlcdata{content = Id}.
 2055: 
 2056: maybe_rsm_direction(undefined, undefined) ->
 2057:     undefined;
 2058: maybe_rsm_direction(Direction, Id) ->
 2059:     #xmlel{
 2060:         name = atom_to_binary(Direction, latin1),
 2061:         children = maybe_rsm_id(Id)}.
 2062: 
 2063: maybe_rsm_index(undefined) ->
 2064:     undefined;
 2065: maybe_rsm_index(Index) when is_integer(Index) ->
 2066:     #xmlel{
 2067:         name = <<"index">>,
 2068:         children = #xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Index)}}.
 2069: 
 2070: maybe_rsm_max(undefined) ->
 2071:     undefined;
 2072: maybe_rsm_max(Max) when is_integer(Max) ->
 2073:     #xmlel{
 2074:         name = <<"max">>,
 2075:         children = #xmlcdata{content = integer_to_list(Max)}}.
 2076: 
 2077: add_with_jid(BWithJID,
 2078:     IQ=#xmlel{children=[
 2079:         Query=#xmlel{children=QueryChildren}]}) ->
 2080:     IQ#xmlel{children=[
 2081:         Query#xmlel{children=[maybe_with_elem(BWithJID) | QueryChildren]}]}.
 2082: 
 2083: assert_only_one_of_many_is_equal(Archived, Sent) ->
 2084:     Scanned = lists:map(fun parse_forwarded_message/1, Archived),
 2085:     Same = lists:filter(fun (Stanza) -> is_same_message_text(Stanza, Sent) end, Scanned),
 2086:     ?assert_equal(1, erlang:length(Same)).
 2087: 
 2088: assert_not_stored(Archived, Sent) ->
 2089:     Scanned = lists:map(fun parse_forwarded_message/1, Archived),
 2090:     Same = lists:filter(fun (Stanza) -> is_same_message_text(Stanza, Sent) end, Scanned),
 2091:     ?assert_equal(0, erlang:length(Same)).
 2092: 
 2093: is_same_message_text(Stanza, Raw) ->
 2094:     #forwarded_message{message_body = A} = Stanza,
 2095:     A =:= Raw.
 2096: 
 2097: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 2098: %% PREFERENCE QUERIES
 2099: 
 2100: stanza_prefs_set_request(DefaultMode, AlwaysJIDs, NeverJIDs) ->
 2101:     AlwaysEl = #xmlel{name = <<"always">>,
 2102:                       children = encode_jids(AlwaysJIDs)},
 2103:     NeverEl  = #xmlel{name = <<"never">>,
 2104:                       children = encode_jids(NeverJIDs)},
 2105:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"set">>, [#xmlel{
 2106:        name = <<"prefs">>,
 2107:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}]
 2108:                ++ [{<<"default">>, DefaultMode} || is_def(DefaultMode)],
 2109:        children = [AlwaysEl, NeverEl]
 2110:     }]).
 2111: 
 2112: stanza_prefs_get_request() ->
 2113:     escalus_stanza:iq(<<"get">>, [#xmlel{
 2114:        name = <<"prefs">>,
 2115:        attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>,mam_ns_binary()}]
 2116:     }]).
 2117: 
 2118: %% Allows to cdata to be put as it is
 2119: encode_jids(JIDs) ->
 2120:     [encode_jid_or_cdata(JID) || JID <- JIDs].
 2121: 
 2122: encode_jid_or_cdata({xmlcdata, Text}) ->
 2123:     {xmlcdata, Text};
 2124: encode_jid_or_cdata(JID) ->
 2125:     #xmlel{name = <<"jid">>,
 2126:            children = [#xmlcdata{content = JID}]}.
 2127: 
 2128: %% ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 2129: %% PARSING RESPONDS
 2130: 
 2131: parse_forwarded_message(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 2132:                                attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 2133:     M = #forwarded_message{
 2134:         from = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 2135:         to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs)},
 2136:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message]'/2, M, Children).
 2137: 
 2138: 'parse_children[message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"result">>,
 2139:                                  attrs = Attrs,
 2140:                                  children = Children}, M) ->
 2141:     M1 = M#forwarded_message{
 2142:         result_queryid = proplists:get_value(<<"queryid">>, Attrs),
 2143:         result_id      = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 2144:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result]'/2, M1, Children).
 2145: 
 2146: 'parse_children[message/result]'(#xmlel{name = <<"forwarded">>,
 2147:                                         children = Children}, M) ->
 2148:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'/2, M, Children).
 2149: 
 2150: 
 2151: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'(#xmlel{name = <<"delay">>,
 2152:                                                   attrs = Attrs}, M) ->
 2153:     M#forwarded_message{
 2154:         delay_from  = proplists:get_value(<<"from">>, Attrs),
 2155:         delay_stamp = proplists:get_value(<<"stamp">>, Attrs)};
 2156: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded]'(#xmlel{name = <<"message">>,
 2157:                                                   attrs = Attrs,
 2158:                                                   children = Children}, M) ->
 2159:     M1 = M#forwarded_message{
 2160:         message_to   = proplists:get_value(<<"to">>, Attrs),
 2161:         message_type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs)},
 2162:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'/2,
 2163:                 M1, Children).
 2164: 
 2165: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(#xmlel{name = <<"body">>,
 2166:         children = [{xmlcdata, Body}]}, M) ->
 2167:     M#forwarded_message{message_body = Body};
 2168: %% Parse `<archived />' here.
 2169: 'parse_children[message/result/forwarded/message]'(_, M) ->
 2170:     M.
 2171: 
 2172: %% Num is 1-based.
 2173: message_id(Num, Config) ->
 2174:     AllMessages = proplists:get_value(all_messages, Config),
 2175:     #forwarded_message{result_id=Id} = lists:nth(Num, AllMessages),
 2176:     Id.
 2177: 
 2178: 
 2179: %% @doc Result query iq.
 2180: %%
 2181: %% [{xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 2182: %%     [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost">>},
 2183: %%      {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
 2184: %%      {<<"id">>,<<"387862024ce65379b049e19751e4309e">>},
 2185: %%      {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 2186: %%     []}]
 2187: %%
 2188: %%
 2189: %%  [{xmlel,<<"iq">>,
 2190: %%       [{<<"from">>,<<"alice@localhost">>},
 2191: %%        {<<"to">>,<<"alice@localhost/res1">>},
 2192: %%        {<<"id">>,<<"c256a18c4b720465e215a81362d41eb7">>},
 2193: %%        {<<"type">>,<<"result">>}],
 2194: %%       [{xmlel,<<"query">>,
 2195: %%            [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"urn:xmpp:mam:tmp">>}],
 2196: %%            [{xmlel,<<"set">>,
 2197: %%                 [{<<"xmlns">>,<<"http://jabber.org/protocol/rsm">>}],
 2198: %%                 [{xmlel,<<"first">>,
 2199: %%                      [{<<"index">>,<<"10">>}],
 2200: %%                      [{xmlcdata,<<"103439">>}]},
 2201: %%                  {xmlel,<<"last">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"103447">>}]},
 2202: %%                  {xmlel,<<"count">>,[],[{xmlcdata,<<"15">>}]}]}]}]}]
 2203: parse_result_iq(P, Result) ->
 2204:     case get_prop(result_format, P) of
 2205:         mess_fin ->
 2206:             parse_fin_and_iq(Result);
 2207:         iq_query ->
 2208:             parse_legacy_iq(respond_iq(Result));
 2209:         iq_fin ->
 2210:             parse_fin_iq(Result)
 2211:     end.
 2212: 
 2213: %% MAM v0.3
 2214: parse_fin_and_iq(#mam_archive_respond{respond_iq=IQ, respond_fin=FinMsg}) ->
 2215:     Fin = exml_query:subelement(FinMsg, <<"fin">>),
 2216:     Set = exml_query:subelement(Fin, <<"set">>),
 2217:     parse_set_and_iq(IQ, Set).
 2218: 
 2219: %% MAM v0.4
 2220: parse_fin_iq(#mam_archive_respond{respond_iq=IQ, respond_fin=undefined}) ->
 2221:     Fin = exml_query:subelement(IQ, <<"fin">>),
 2222:     Set = exml_query:subelement(Fin, <<"set">>),
 2223:     parse_set_and_iq(IQ, Set).
 2224: 
 2225: %% MAM v0.2
 2226: parse_legacy_iq(IQ) ->
 2227:     Fin = exml_query:subelement(IQ, <<"query">>),
 2228:     Set = exml_query:subelement(Fin, <<"set">>),
 2229:     parse_set_and_iq(IQ, Set).
 2230: 
 2231: parse_set_and_iq(IQ, Set) ->
 2232:     #result_iq{
 2233:         from        = exml_query:attr(IQ, <<"from">>),
 2234:         to          = exml_query:attr(IQ, <<"to">>),
 2235:         id          = exml_query:attr(IQ, <<"id">>),
 2236:         first       = exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"first">>}, cdata]),
 2237:         first_index = maybe_binary_to_integer(exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"first">>}, {attr, <<"index">>}])),
 2238:         last        = exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"last">>}, cdata]),
 2239:         count       = maybe_binary_to_integer(exml_query:path(Set, [{element, <<"count">>}, cdata]))}.
 2240: 
 2241: 
 2242: is_def(X) -> X =/= undefined.
 2243: 
 2244: 
 2245: 
 2246: parse_prefs_result_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>, children = Children}) ->
 2247:     IQ = #prefs_result_iq{},
 2248:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[prefs_iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 2249: 
 2250: 'parse_children[prefs_iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"prefs">>,
 2251:                                   attrs = Attrs, children = Children},
 2252:                            IQ) ->
 2253:     DefaultMode = proplists:get_value(<<"default">>, Attrs),
 2254:     IQ1 = IQ#prefs_result_iq{default_mode = DefaultMode},
 2255:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'/2, IQ1, Children).
 2256: 
 2257: 
 2258: 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'(#xmlel{name = <<"always">>,
 2259:                                         children = Children},
 2260:                                  IQ) ->
 2261:     IQ#prefs_result_iq{always_jids = lists:sort(parse_jids(Children))};
 2262: 'parse_children[prefs_iq/prefs]'(#xmlel{name = <<"never">>,
 2263:                                         children = Children},
 2264:                                  IQ) ->
 2265:     IQ#prefs_result_iq{never_jids = lists:sort(parse_jids(Children))}.
 2266: 
 2267: 
 2268: parse_jids(Els) ->
 2269:     [escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(JID) %% MongooseIM normalizes JIDs
 2270:      || #xmlel{name = <<"jid">>, children = [{xmlcdata, JID}]} <- Els].
 2271: 
 2272: %% <iq type='error' id='q29302'>
 2273: %%   <error type='modify'>
 2274: %%     <policy-violation xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas'/>
 2275: %%     <text xmlns='urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas'>Too many results</text>
 2276: %%   </error>
 2277: %% </iq>
 2278: parse_error_iq(#xmlel{name = <<"iq">>,
 2279:                       attrs = Attrs, children = Children}) ->
 2280: 
 2281:     IQ = #error_iq{
 2282:         type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs),
 2283:         id   = proplists:get_value(<<"id">>, Attrs)},
 2284:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[error_iq]'/2, IQ, Children).
 2285: 
 2286: 
 2287: 'parse_children[error_iq]'(#xmlel{name = <<"error">>,
 2288:                                   attrs = Attrs, children = Children}, IQ) ->
 2289:     IQ1 = IQ#error_iq{
 2290:         error_type = proplists:get_value(<<"type">>, Attrs)},
 2291:     lists:foldl(fun 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'/2, IQ1, Children);
 2292: 'parse_children[error_iq]'(_, IQ) ->
 2293:     IQ.
 2294: 
 2295: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(#xmlel{name = <<"text">>,
 2296:                                  children = [{xmlcdata, Text}]}, IQ) ->
 2297:     IQ#error_iq{text = Text};
 2298: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(#xmlel{name = Condition}, IQ) ->
 2299:     IQ#error_iq{condition = Condition};
 2300: 'parse_children[error_iq/error]'(_, IQ) ->
 2301:     IQ.
 2302: 
 2303: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2304: %% Helpers (muc)
 2305: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 2306: 
 2307: generate_rpc_jid({_,User}) ->
 2308:     {username, Username} = lists:keyfind(username, 1, User),
 2309:     {server, Server} = lists:keyfind(server, 1, User),
 2310:     LUsername = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Username),
 2311:     LServer = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(Server),
 2312:     {jid, Username, Server, <<"rpc">>, LUsername, LServer, <<"rpc">>}.
 2313: 
 2314: start_alice_room(Config) ->
 2315:     %% TODO: ensure, that the room's archive is empty
 2316:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
 2317:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
 2318:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
 2319:     start_room(Config, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick, [{persistent, true}]).
 2320: 
 2321: start_alice_private_room(Config) ->
 2322:     RoomName = <<"alicesroom">>,
 2323:     RoomNick = <<"alicesnick">>,
 2324:     [Alice | _] = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
 2325:     start_room(Config, Alice, RoomName, RoomNick,
 2326:                [{persistent, true},
 2327:                 {password_protected, true},
 2328:                 {password, <<"secret">>}]).
 2329: 
 2330: start_room(Config, User, Room, Nick, Opts) ->
 2331:     From = generate_rpc_jid(User),
 2332:     rpc_apply(mod_muc, create_instant_room,
 2333:         [<<"localhost">>, Room, From, Nick, Opts]),
 2334:     [{nick, Nick}, {room, Room} | Config].
 2335: 
 2336: destroy_room(Config) ->
 2337:     RoomName = ?config(room, Config),
 2338:     delete_room_archive(muc_host(), RoomName),
 2339:     case rpc_apply(ets, lookup, [muc_online_room, {RoomName, muc_host()}]) of
 2340:         [{_,_,Pid}|_] -> gen_fsm:send_all_state_event(Pid, destroy);
 2341:         _ -> ok
 2342:     end.
 2343: 
 2344: stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, Nick) ->
 2345:     Elem = #xmlel{ name = <<"x">>,
 2346:                    attrs=[{<<"xmlns">>, muc_ns_binary()}]},
 2347:     stanza_to_room(escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>, [Elem]),
 2348:                    Room, Nick).
 2349: 
 2350: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room) ->
 2351:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room)).
 2352: 
 2353: stanza_to_room(Stanza, Room, Nick) ->
 2354:     escalus_stanza:to(Stanza, room_address(Room, Nick)).
 2355: 
 2356: room_address(Room) when is_binary(Room) ->
 2357:     <<Room/binary, "@", (muc_host())/binary>>.
 2358: 
 2359: room_address(Room, Nick) when is_binary(Room), is_binary(Nick) ->
 2360:     <<Room/binary, "@", (muc_host())/binary, "/", Nick/binary>>.
 2361: 
 2362: 
 2363: send_muc_rsm_messages(Config) ->
 2364:     Pid = self(),
 2365:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2366:     RoomAddr = room_address(Room),
 2367:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 2368:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2369:         escalus:send(Alice, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Alice))),
 2370:         escalus:send(Bob, stanza_muc_enter_room(Room, nick(Bob))),
 2371: 
 2372:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3),
 2373:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3),
 2374: 
 2375:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 2376:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 2377:                       escalus_stanza:groupchat_to(RoomAddr, generate_message_text(N)))
 2378:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 2379:         %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 2380:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 2381:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 15, 5000),
 2382:         %% Get whole history.
 2383:         escalus:send(Alice,
 2384:             stanza_to_room(stanza_archive_request(P, <<"all_room_messages">>), Room)),
 2385:         AllMessages =
 2386:             respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 15, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice))),
 2387:         ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 2388:         Pid ! {parsed_messages, ParsedMessages},
 2389:         ok
 2390:         end,
 2391:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config),
 2392:     escalus:story(Config1, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F),
 2393:     ParsedMessages = receive {parsed_messages, PM} -> PM
 2394:                      after 5000 -> error(receive_timeout) end,
 2395: 
 2396:     escalus:end_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config1),
 2397:     [{all_messages, ParsedMessages}|Config].
 2398: 
 2399: send_rsm_messages(Config) ->
 2400:     Pid = self(),
 2401:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2402:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 2403:     F = fun(Alice, Bob) ->
 2404:         %% Alice sends messages to Bob.
 2405:         [escalus:send(Alice,
 2406:                       escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, generate_message_text(N)))
 2407:          || N <- lists:seq(1, 15)],
 2408:         %% Bob is waiting for 15 messages for 5 seconds.
 2409:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 15, 5000),
 2410:         maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2411:         %% Get whole history.
 2412:         rsm_send(Config, Alice, stanza_archive_request(P, <<"all_messages">>)),
 2413:         AllMessages =
 2414:             respond_messages(assert_respond_size(P, 15, wait_archive_respond(P, Alice))),
 2415:         ParsedMessages = [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- AllMessages],
 2416:         Pid ! {parsed_messages, ParsedMessages},
 2417:         ok
 2418:         end,
 2419:     Config1 = escalus:init_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config),
 2420:     escalus:story(Config1, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}], F),
 2421:     ParsedMessages = receive {parsed_messages, PM} -> PM
 2422:                      after 5000 -> error(receive_timeout) end,
 2423: 
 2424:     escalus:end_per_testcase(pre_rsm, Config1),
 2425:     [{all_messages, ParsedMessages}|Config].
 2426: 
 2427: append_subelem(Elem=#xmlel{children=Cs}, SubElem) ->
 2428:     Elem#xmlel{children=Cs ++ [SubElem]}.
 2429: 
 2430: archived_elem(By, Id) ->
 2431:     #xmlel{name = <<"archived">>,
 2432:            attrs = [{<<"by">>, By}, {<<"id">>, Id}]}.
 2433: 
 2434: clean_archives(Config) ->
 2435:     SUs = serv_users(Config),
 2436:     %% It is not the best place to delete these messages.
 2437:     [ok = delete_offline_messages(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2438:     [ok = delete_archive(S, U) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2439:     %% Retry 10 times if not empty
 2440:     [assert_empty_archive(S, U, 10) || {S, U} <- SUs],
 2441:     Config.
 2442: 
 2443: clean_room_archive(Config) ->
 2444:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2445:     delete_room_archive(muc_host(), Room),
 2446:     %% Retry 10 times if not empty
 2447:     assert_empty_room_archive(muc_host(), Room, 10),
 2448:     Config.
 2449: 
 2450: serv_users(Config) ->
 2451:     [serv_user(Config, UserSpec)
 2452:      || {_, UserSpec} <- escalus_users:get_users(all)].
 2453: 
 2454: serv_user(Config, UserSpec) ->
 2455:     [Username, Server, _Pass] = escalus_users:get_usp(Config, UserSpec),
 2456:     {Server, Username}.
 2457: 
 2458: %% @doc Check, that the archive is empty.
 2459: assert_empty_archive(Server, Username, RetryTimes) when is_integer(RetryTimes) -> 
 2460:     %% Wait for zero messages in archive
 2461:     case wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, 0) of
 2462:        0 -> ok;
 2463:        X -> ct:fail({not_empty, Server, Username, {actual_size, X}})
 2464:     end.
 2465: 
 2466: wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, _RetryTimes=0, _ExpectedSize) ->
 2467:     archive_size(Server, Username);
 2468: wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, ExpectedSize) when RetryTimes > 0 ->
 2469:     case archive_size(Server, Username) of
 2470:         ExpectedSize ->
 2471:             ExpectedSize;
 2472:         _ActualSize ->
 2473:             %% Wait and retry
 2474:             timer:sleep(100),
 2475:             wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes-1, ExpectedSize)
 2476:     end.
 2477: 
 2478: wait_for_archive_size_or_warning(Server, Username, RetryTimes, ExpectedSize) ->
 2479:     case wait_for_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, ExpectedSize) of
 2480:         ExpectedSize -> ok;
 2481:         ActualSize ->
 2482:             ct:pal("issue=wait_for_archive_size_or_warning, expected_size=~p, actual_size=~p",
 2483:                    [ExpectedSize, ActualSize])
 2484:     end.
 2485: 
 2486: %% @doc Check, that the archive is empty.
 2487: assert_empty_room_archive(Server, Username, RetryTimes) ->
 2488:     %% Wait for zero messages in archive
 2489:     case wait_for_room_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, 0) of
 2490:        0 -> ok;
 2491:        X -> ct:fail({room_not_empty, Server, Username, {actual_size, X}})
 2492:     end.
 2493: 
 2494: wait_for_room_archive_size(Server, Username, _RetryTimes=0, _ExpectedSize) ->
 2495:     room_archive_size(Server, Username);
 2496: wait_for_room_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes, ExpectedSize) when RetryTimes > 0 ->
 2497:     case room_archive_size(Server, Username) of
 2498:         ExpectedSize ->
 2499:             ExpectedSize;
 2500:         _ActualSize ->
 2501:             %% Wait and retry
 2502:             timer:sleep(100),
 2503:             wait_for_room_archive_size(Server, Username, RetryTimes-1, ExpectedSize)
 2504:     end.
 2505: 
 2506: 
 2507: archive_size(Server, Username) ->
 2508:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_size, [Server, Username]).
 2509: 
 2510: room_archive_size(Server, Username) ->
 2511:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_size, [Server, Username]).
 2512: 
 2513: delete_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2514:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, delete_archive, [Server, Username]).
 2515: 
 2516: delete_room_archive(Server, Username) ->
 2517:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, delete_archive, [Server, Username]).
 2518: 
 2519: delete_offline_messages(Server, Username) ->
 2520:     %% Do not care
 2521:     catch rpc_apply(mod_offline, remove_user, [Username, Server]),
 2522:     ok.
 2523: 
 2524: wait_message_range(P, Client, FromN, ToN) ->
 2525:     wait_message_range(P, Client, 15, FromN-1, FromN, ToN).
 2526: 
 2527: wait_message_range(P, Client, TotalCount, Offset, FromN, ToN) ->
 2528:     Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Client),
 2529:     Messages = respond_messages(Result),
 2530:     IQ = respond_iq(Result),
 2531:     ParsedMessages = parse_messages(Messages),
 2532:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(P, Result),
 2533:     try
 2534:         ?assert_equal(TotalCount, ParsedIQ#result_iq.count),
 2535:         ?assert_equal(Offset, ParsedIQ#result_iq.first_index),
 2536:         %% Compare body of the messages.
 2537:         ?assert_equal([generate_message_text(N) || N <- lists:seq(FromN, ToN)],
 2538:                       [B || #forwarded_message{message_body=B} <- ParsedMessages]),
 2539:         ok
 2540:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2541:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2542:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~n"
 2543:                "Messages: ~p~n"
 2544:                "Parsed messages: ~p~n",
 2545:                [IQ, Messages, ParsedMessages]),
 2546:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2547:     end.
 2548: 
 2549: 
 2550: wait_empty_rset(P, Alice, TotalCount) ->
 2551:     Result = wait_archive_respond(P, Alice),
 2552:     IQ = respond_iq(Result),
 2553:     ?assert_equal([], respond_messages(Result)),
 2554:     ParsedIQ = parse_result_iq(P, Result),
 2555:     try
 2556:         ?assert_equal(TotalCount, ParsedIQ#result_iq.count),
 2557:         ok
 2558:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2559:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2560:         ct:pal("IQ: ~p~n", [IQ]),
 2561:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2562:     end.
 2563: 
 2564: parse_messages(Messages) ->
 2565:     try [parse_forwarded_message(M) || M <- Messages]
 2566:     catch Class:Reason ->
 2567:         Stacktrace = erlang:get_stacktrace(),
 2568:         ct:pal("Messages: ~p~n", [Messages]),
 2569:         erlang:raise(Class, Reason, Stacktrace)
 2570:     end.
 2571: 
 2572: bootstrap_archive(Config) ->
 2573:     random:seed(now()),
 2574:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 2575:     ArcJID = {<<"alice@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"alice">> ,Domain, <<>>),
 2576:              rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"alice">>])},
 2577:     OtherUsers = [{<<"bob@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"bob">>, Domain, <<>>),
 2578:                    rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"bob">>])},
 2579:                   {<<"carol@",Domain/binary>>, make_jid(<<"carol">>, Domain, <<>>),
 2580:                    rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_id, [Domain, <<"carol">>])}],
 2581:     Msgs = generate_msgs_for_days(ArcJID, OtherUsers, 16),
 2582:     put_msgs(Msgs),
 2583:     AllUsers = [{Domain, <<"alice">>}, {Domain, <<"bob">>}, {Domain, <<"carol">>}],
 2584:     wait_for_msgs(Msgs, AllUsers),
 2585: 
 2586:     [{pre_generated_msgs, sort_msgs(Msgs)} | Config].
 2587: 
 2588: %% Wait for messages to be written
 2589: wait_for_msgs(Msgs, Users) ->
 2590:     UsersCnt = [{S, U, count_msgs(Msgs, S, U)} || {S, U} <- Users],
 2591:     [wait_for_archive_size_or_warning(S, U, 10, C) || {S, U, C} <- UsersCnt],
 2592:     ok.
 2593: 
 2594: count_msgs(Msgs, S, U) ->
 2595:     Bin = <<U/binary, "@", S/binary>>,
 2596:     length([1 ||
 2597:             {_,
 2598:              {FromBin, _FromJID, _FromArcID},
 2599:              {ToBin, _ToJID, _ToArcID}, _, _Packet} <- Msgs,
 2600:            FromBin =:= Bin orelse ToBin =:= Bin]).
 2601: 
 2602: sort_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2603:     SortFun = fun({{ID1, _}, _, _, _, _}, {{ID2, _}, _, _, _, _}) ->
 2604:         ID1 =< ID2
 2605:     end,
 2606:     lists:sort(SortFun,Msgs).
 2607: 
 2608: generate_msgs_for_days(OwnerJID, OtherUsers, Days) ->
 2609:     {TodayDate, _} = calendar:local_time(),
 2610:     Today = calendar:date_to_gregorian_days(TodayDate),
 2611:     StartDay = Today - Days,
 2612:     lists:flatten([generate_msgs_for_day(Day, OwnerJID, OtherUsers)
 2613:                    || Day <- lists:seq(StartDay, Today)]).
 2614: 
 2615: generate_msgs_for_day(Day, OwnerJID, OtherUsers) ->
 2616:     Date = calendar:gregorian_days_to_date(Day),
 2617: 
 2618:     [generate_msg_for_date_user(OwnerJID, RemoteJID, {Date, random_time()})
 2619:      || RemoteJID <- OtherUsers].
 2620: 
 2621: generate_msg_for_date_user(Owner, {RemoteBin, _, _} = Remote, DateTime) ->
 2622:     MicrosecDateTime = datetime_to_microseconds(DateTime),
 2623:     NowMicro = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, now_to_microseconds, [rpc_apply(erlang, now, [])]),
 2624:     Microsec = min(NowMicro, MicrosecDateTime),
 2625:     MsgIdOwner = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, encode_compact_uuid, [Microsec, random:uniform(20)]),
 2626:     MsgIdRemote = rpc_apply(mod_mam_utils, encode_compact_uuid, [Microsec+1, random:uniform(20)]),
 2627:     Packet = escalus_stanza:chat_to(RemoteBin, base16:encode(crypto:rand_bytes(4))),
 2628:     {{MsgIdOwner, MsgIdRemote}, Owner, Remote, Owner, Packet}.
 2629: 
 2630: random_time() ->
 2631:     MaxSecondsInDay = 86399,
 2632:     RandSeconds = random:uniform(MaxSecondsInDay),
 2633:     calendar:seconds_to_time(RandSeconds).
 2634: 
 2635: datetime_to_microseconds({{_,_,_}, {_,_,_}} = DateTime) ->
 2636:     S1 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds(DateTime),
 2637:     S0 = calendar:datetime_to_gregorian_seconds({{1970, 1, 1}, {0, 0, 0}}),
 2638:     Seconds = S1 - S0,
 2639:     Seconds * 1000000.
 2640: 
 2641: 
 2642: put_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2643:     [put_msg(Msg) || Msg <- Msgs].
 2644: 
 2645: put_msg({{MsgIdOwner, MsgIdRemote},
 2646:          {_FromBin, FromJID, FromArcID},
 2647:          {_ToBin, ToJID, ToArcID},
 2648:          {_, Source, _}, Packet}) ->
 2649:     Host = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
 2650:     archive_message([Host, MsgIdOwner, FromArcID, FromJID, ToJID, Source, outgoing, Packet]),
 2651:     archive_message([Host, MsgIdRemote, ToArcID, ToJID, FromJID, Source, incoming, Packet]).
 2652: 
 2653: archive_message(Args) ->
 2654:     rpc_apply(mod_mam, archive_message, Args).
 2655: 
 2656: 
 2657: 
 2658: muc_bootstrap_archive(Config) ->
 2659:     Room = ?config(room, Config),
 2660: 
 2661:     A = room_address(Room, nick(alice)),
 2662:     B = room_address(Room, nick(bob)),
 2663:     R = room_address(Room),
 2664: 
 2665:     Domain = muc_host(),
 2666:     Host = host(),
 2667:     RoomJid = make_jid(Room,Domain, <<>>),
 2668:     ArcJID = {R, RoomJid,
 2669:               rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_id, [Domain, Room])},
 2670:     Msgs = generate_msgs_for_days(ArcJID,
 2671:                                  [{B, make_jid(<<"bob">>, Host, <<"res1">>),
 2672:                                   rpc_apply(jid, replace_resource, [RoomJid, nick(bob)])},
 2673:                                   {A, make_jid(<<"alice">>, Host, <<"res1">>),
 2674:                                    rpc_apply(jid, replace_resource, [RoomJid, nick(alice)])}], 16),
 2675: 
 2676:     put_muc_msgs(Msgs),
 2677: 
 2678:     maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2679: 
 2680:     [{pre_generated_muc_msgs, sort_msgs(Msgs)} | Config].
 2681: 
 2682: put_muc_msgs(Msgs) ->
 2683:     Host = host(),
 2684:     [archive_muc_msg(Host, Msg) || Msg <- Msgs].
 2685: 
 2686: archive_muc_msg(Host, {{MsgID, _},
 2687:                 {_RoomBin, RoomJID, RoomArcID},
 2688:                 {_FromBin, FromJID, SrcJID}, _, Packet}) ->
 2689:     rpc_apply(mod_mam_muc, archive_message, [Host, MsgID, RoomArcID, RoomJID,
 2690:                                              SrcJID, SrcJID, incoming, Packet]).
 2691: 
 2692: %% @doc Get a binary jid of the user, that tagged with `UserName' in the config.
 2693: nick_to_jid(UserName, Config) when is_atom(UserName) ->
 2694:     UserSpec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, UserName),
 2695:     escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(escalus_users:get_jid(Config, UserSpec)).
 2696: 
 2697: make_jid(U, S, R) ->
 2698:     rpc_apply(jid, make, [U, S, R]).
 2699: 
 2700: 
 2701: is_mam_possible(Host) ->
 2702:     is_odbc_enabled(Host) orelse is_riak_enabled(Host).
 2703: 
 2704: is_odbc_enabled(Host) ->
 2705:     case sql_transaction(Host, fun erlang:now/0) of
 2706:         {atomic, _} -> true;
 2707:         Other ->
 2708:             %ct:pal("ODBC disabled (check failed ~p)", [Other]),
 2709:             false
 2710:     end.
 2711: 
 2712: is_riak_enabled(_Host) ->
 2713:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mongoose_riak, get_worker, []) of
 2714:         Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
 2715:             true;
 2716:         _ ->
 2717:             false
 2718:     end.
 2719: 
 2720: sql_transaction(Host, F) ->
 2721:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_odbc, sql_transaction, [Host, F]).
 2722: 
 2723: login_send_presence(Config, User) ->
 2724:     Spec = escalus_users:get_userspec(Config, User),
 2725:     {ok, Client} = escalus_client:start(Config, Spec, <<"dummy">>),
 2726:     escalus:send(Client, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
 2727:     Client.
 2728: 
 2729: maybe_wait_for_yz(Config) ->
 2730:     case ?config(yz_wait, Config) of
 2731:         undefined ->
 2732:             ok;
 2733:         Value ->
 2734:             timer:sleep(Value)
 2735:     end.
 2736: 
 2737: 
 2738: %% Bob and Alice are friends.
 2739: %% Kate and Alice are not friends.
 2740: %%
 2741: %% Messages:
 2742: %% 1. Bob sends a message to Alice
 2743: %% 2. Alice sends a message to Bob
 2744: %% 3. Kate sends a message to Alice
 2745: %% 4. Alice sends a message to Kate
 2746: %%
 2747: %% Each tuple is
 2748: %% {{Default, Always, Never},
 2749: %%  [Message1Archived, Message2Archived, Message3Archied, Message4Archived]}
 2750: prefs_cases2() ->
 2751:     [
 2752:      {{roster, [], []},              [true, true, false, false]},
 2753:      {{roster, [bob], []},           [true, true, false, false]},
 2754:      {{roster, [kate], []},          [true, true, true, true]},
 2755:      {{roster, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2756:  
 2757:      {{roster, [], [bob]},           [false, false, false, false]},
 2758:      {{roster, [], [kate]},          [true, true, false, false]},
 2759:      {{roster, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]},
 2760:  
 2761:  
 2762:      {{never, [], []},              [false, false, false, false]},
 2763:      {{never, [bob], []},           [true, true, false, false]},
 2764:      {{never, [kate], []},          [false, false, true, true]},
 2765:      {{never, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2766:  
 2767:      {{never, [], [bob]},           [false, false, false, false]},
 2768:      {{never, [], [kate]},          [false, false, false, false]},
 2769:      {{never, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]},
 2770:  
 2771:  
 2772:      {{always, [], []},              [true, true, true, true]},
 2773:      {{always, [bob], []},           [true, true, true, true]},
 2774:      {{always, [kate], []},          [true, true, true, true]},
 2775:      {{always, [kate, bob], []},     [true, true, true, true]},
 2776:  
 2777:      {{always, [], [bob]},           [false, false, true, true]},
 2778:      {{always, [], [kate]},          [true, true, false, false]},
 2779:      {{always, [], [bob, kate]},     [false, false, false, false]}
 2780:     ].
 2781: 
 2782: 
 2783: run_prefs_cases(Config) ->
 2784:     F = fun(Alice, Bob, Kate) ->
 2785:         make_alice_and_bob_friends(Alice, Bob),
 2786:         [run_prefs_case(Case, Alice, Bob, Kate, Config) || Case <- prefs_cases2()]
 2787:         end,
 2788:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}, {kate, 1}], F).
 2789: 
 2790: make_alice_and_bob_friends(Alice, Bob) ->
 2791:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), <<"subscribe">>)), 
 2792:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 1, 5000), % iq set
 2793:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % presence subscribe
 2794: 
 2795:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Alice), <<"subscribed">>)), 
 2796:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 3, 5000), % iq set, presence subscribed, presence
 2797:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=from
 2798: 
 2799:         escalus_client:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Alice), <<"subscribe">>)), 
 2800:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2, 5000), % iq set subscription=to, presence subscribe
 2801:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=from
 2802: 
 2803:         escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence_direct(escalus_client:short_jid(Bob), <<"subscribed">>)), 
 2804:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 1, 5000), % iq set subscription=both
 2805:         escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 3, 5000), % iq set subscription=both, presence subscribed, presence
 2806:         ok.
 2807: 
 2808: run_prefs_case({PrefsState, ExpectedMessageStates}, Alice, Bob, Kate, Config) ->
 2809:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 2810:     IqSet = stanza_prefs_set_request(PrefsState, Config),
 2811:     escalus:send(Alice, IqSet),
 2812:     ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2813:     Messages = [iolist_to_binary(io_lib:format("n=~p, prefs=~p, now=~p",
 2814:                                                [N, PrefsState, now()]))
 2815:                 || N <- [1,2,3,4]],
 2816:     %% Messages:
 2817:     %% 1. Bob sends a message to Alice
 2818:     %% 2. Alice sends a message to Bob
 2819:     %% 3. Kate sends a message to Alice
 2820:     %% 4. Alice sends a message to Kate
 2821:     escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, lists:nth(1, Messages))),
 2822:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, lists:nth(2, Messages))),
 2823:     escalus:send(Kate, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, lists:nth(3, Messages))),
 2824:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Kate, lists:nth(4, Messages))),
 2825:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Bob, 1, 5000),
 2826:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Kate, 1, 5000),
 2827:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, 2, 5000),
 2828:     maybe_wait_for_yz(Config),
 2829:     %% Get last four archived texts
 2830:     Stanzas = get_last_four_messages(P, Alice),
 2831:     ParsedMessages = parse_messages(Stanzas),
 2832:     Bodies = [B || #forwarded_message{message_body=B} <- ParsedMessages],
 2833:     ActualMessageStates = [lists:member(M, Bodies) || M <- Messages],
 2834:     ?assert_equal_extra(ExpectedMessageStates, ActualMessageStates,
 2835:                         [{prefs_state, PrefsState}]),
 2836:     ok.
 2837: 
 2838: get_last_four_messages(P, Alice) ->
 2839:     RSM = #rsm_in{max=4, direction='before'},
 2840:     escalus:send(Alice, stanza_page_archive_request(P, <<"last4_rsm">>, RSM)),
 2841:     respond_messages(wait_archive_respond(P, Alice)).
 2842: 
 2843: stanza_prefs_set_request({DefaultMode, AlwaysUsers, NeverUsers}, Config) ->
 2844:     DefaultModeBin = atom_to_binary(DefaultMode, utf8),
 2845:     AlwaysJIDs = users_to_jids(AlwaysUsers, Config),
 2846:     NeverJIDs  = users_to_jids(NeverUsers, Config),
 2847:     stanza_prefs_set_request(DefaultModeBin, AlwaysJIDs, NeverJIDs).
 2848: 
 2849: users_to_jids(Users, Config) ->
 2850:     [escalus_users:get_jid(Config, User) || User <- Users].
 2851: 
 2852: print_configuration_not_supported(C, B) ->
 2853:     I = io_lib:format("issue=configuration_not_supported, "
 2854:                        "configuration=~p, basic_group=~p", [C, B]),
 2855:      binary_to_list(iolist_to_binary(I)).
 2856: 
 2857: %% The same as prefs_set_request case but for different configurations
 2858: run_set_and_get_prefs_cases(Config) ->
 2859:     P = ?config(props, Config),
 2860:     F = fun(Alice) ->
 2861:         [run_set_and_get_prefs_case(Case, Alice, Config) || Case <- prefs_cases2()]
 2862:         end,
 2863:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], F).
 2864: 
 2865: %% Alice sets and gets her preferences
 2866: run_set_and_get_prefs_case({PrefsState, _ExpectedMessageStates}, Alice, Config) ->
 2867:     IqSet = stanza_prefs_set_request(PrefsState, Config),
 2868:     escalus:send(Alice, IqSet),
 2869:     ReplySet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, 5000),
 2870: 
 2871:     escalus:send(Alice, stanza_prefs_get_request()),
 2872:     ReplyGet = escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
 2873: 
 2874:     ResultIQ1 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplySet),
 2875:     ResultIQ2 = parse_prefs_result_iq(ReplyGet),
 2876:     ?assert_equal(ResultIQ1, ResultIQ2),
 2877:     ok.
 2878: 
 2879: maybe_binary_to_integer(B) when is_binary(B) ->
 2880:     list_to_integer(binary_to_list(B));
 2881: maybe_binary_to_integer(undefined) ->
 2882:     undefined.
 2883: 
 2884: add_nostore_hint(#xmlel{children=Children}=Elem) ->
 2885:     Elem#xmlel{children=Children ++ [nostore_hint_elem()]}.
 2886: 
 2887: nostore_hint_elem() ->
 2888:     #xmlel{name = <<"no-store">>, attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, <<"urn:xmpp:hints">>}]}.
